title: Baby Earol Olive Oil Spray - 10ml
description:
Baby Earol is a natural and effective method of softening, breaking-up and/or loosening earwax. After ears are clear of earwax using Baby Earol once per week can help keep new earwax soft and help prevent dryness of the skin in the ear canal reducing itching and irritation.
Baby Earol has a simple patented delivery system capable of delivering a discrete metered dose of oil into the outer ear, enhancing ease of use, reducing over application and significantly reducing spillage/mess.
No need for unsightly cotton wool swabs.
  • Simple and effective
  • Softens, breaks-up and loosens earwax prior to its removal
  • Contains a minimum of 180 metered dose sprays
  • Moisturises the ear canals helping prevent & soothe itchy ears



Suitable for

Children from 6 months to 12 years



How to use

Apply Baby Earol spray as directed by your pharmacist, audiologist, doctor or nurse.



Hazards and Cautions

Keep all medicines out of the sight and reach of children.



Ingredients

Pharmaceutical grade olive oil and mineral oil.

title: Babymoov Moov & Boost Baby Carrier Hazelnut
description:
The ergonomic baby carrier which converts into a booster seat - designed with a French Physiotherapist.

 Patented and designed in conjunction with a French physiotherapist, Camille Rieu • Adaptable: converts into a booster seat using an ingenious system of detachable straps and an inflatable cushion (10cm thick) • Safe booster seat with 5-point harness • Ingenious A-line shape to suit your growing baby (supports the back and keeps the hips in the optimum position) • Easy to use with coloured clips and straps only
• Padded straps and reinforced abdominal belt
• Compact, lightweight and converts into a carry bag
• Outer pockets and zip pocket on the waist strap
• Anti-UV and rain hood
• Clip for attaching a shoulder bag 
• Silicone teething ring level with the child's head
• Organic and water-repellent cotton canvas, recycled materials (GRS certification: Global Recycled Standard) 
• Newborn insert sold separately (3kg to 5kg)




an ergonomic baby carrier that converts into a booster seat. There is no compromise on comfort, health and safety as this adaptable baby carrier was designed in conjunction with Camille Rieu, a physiotherapist specialising in the development of children's motor skills and a mother to 2 children herself. 


As a parent, it always feels disorganised and rushed whenever you need to go out with your baby - then there’s the fear of forgetting something and not having enough space. Make life easier by just taking one item with you for mealtimes as well as travelling.  With an ingenious patented system of detachable straps and an inflatable cushion, it takes less than 5 minutes to convert your baby carrier into a secure booster seat! And since we really have thought of everything, the Moov & Boost baby carrier converts into a shoulder bag so it's really easy to carry.


Its ingenious A-line shape moulds to your baby's body shape, and can be used for babies weighing up to 20 kg. It keeps your baby's back in a rounded shape and guarantees they are carried in the healthy 'frog' position which is best for their hips. This baby carrier means you can carry your baby in three ergonomic positions: on your front, back or side. If you would like to start carrying your baby from birth (weight 3kg to 5kg), you will need our newborn insert (sold separately). 


This Moov & Boost baby carrier is also designed with the carrier's body shape in mind. It has a really comfortable design with padded straps and reinforced abdominal belt. 


And because the action we take today shapes the future of our children, Babymoov is committed to reducing its environmental impact, whilst protecting their sensitive skin:  - The ergonomic baby carrier is made from high quality, soft and water-repellent 100% organic cotton canvas. 
- At the back, breathable recycled polyester mesh provides good ventilation so that baby can be carried all year round. 
- The booster seat fabric is also made from recycled polyester.


Product tested in accordance with the strictest baby equipment standards and certified as "hip-friendly" by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute. 


Through experience, we know that baby likes to grab the straps and chew on them, which is why we have added a detachable silicone teething ring.
The Moov & Boost baby carrier has lots of other ingenious accessories, such as a hood to protect baby from the rain and UV rays, 3 storage pockets for carrying the booster seat section and other essential items for your trip, and a shoulder clip for attaching a handbag or tote bag to keep your hands free!

title: Babymoov Lovenest Original organic cotton head support smokey
description: Babymoov Lovenest Original organic cotton head support smokeyThe original Lovenest is the memory foam newborn head support pillow which promotes healthy development of a well-rounded head within the first 3 months and while baby's skull is still soft! Developed and patented by French Paediatrician Dr Maidenberg, the Lovenest anti-flat head pillow is an inclined head support designed to cushion baby's head while laid down for play, rest and sleep. Lovenest works by evenly distributing the weight of baby's head across the back of the skull to prevent a flat head (plagiocephaly) from forming in any one spot.During the first months of their life, your baby can spend hours on their back.To reduce the risk of flat head syndrome, use a Lovenest head support on baby's activity mat, in their cot, pram and even a baby bouncer. This ergonomic head support, which is patented and made in Portugal, is specially angled and shaped to suit the shape of an infant's skull to ensure an even distribution of pressure across the head, whilst allowing total freedom of movement. Very practical, portable and hygienic: the Lovenest is lightweight, adaptable for use between flat and upright surfaces and is easily washable in the washing machine at 30°CIMPORTANT: Use the Lovenest straight from birth and up to 3 -4 months old or until baby is able to roll over unaided.

title: Bach Rescue Peaceful Night Capsules 30s
description:
RESCUE knows quality sleep after a demanding day can be difficult unless you’re relaxed and ready for bed. New Peaceful Night Capsules are designed as a unique way to help you unwind and relax in preparation for a restful quality sleep; so you awake feeling more refreshed. They are an active fusion of botanicals, Magnesium and Vitamin B6 plus RESCUE flower essences which.

RESCUE Peaceful Night Capsules are a specially formulated active fusion of ingredients to help you relax, ready for restful, quality sleep, so you can awake refreshed. They include:

  • Ashwagandha contributes to optimal relaxation
  • Chamomile contributes to optimal relaxation & a normal healthy sleep
  • Magnesium & Vitamin B6 contribute to the reduction of tiredness & fatigue
  • RESCUE Night® flower essences blend with White Chestnut to switch off a racing mind



How to use

TO USE: Adults and children over 12 years, simply take on capsule before bedtime as part of a balanced sleep management routine. Do not exceed the recommended dose. If pregnant or breastfeeding, consult a qualified healthcare practitioner before use. Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle.



Hazards and Cautions

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be substituted for a varied diet or healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is always as accurate as possible, food products are regularly improved and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result we recommend that you always read the label carefully before using or consuming any products. Nutritional Reference Value (NRV) information is based on the typical composition of the product. Guideline daily amounts are those for a typical adult (men and women).NRV information for non Boots products is calculated by the manufacturer. Boots has no control over the recipe or nutritional content of such products and information on this site may differ to that given on the product label. We would therefore recommend you do not solely rely on this information and always read the product label. If you have any queries, or you would like advice on Boots products please contact our friendly Customer care team on 0345 609 0055.

This information was last updated 16/07/2021

Storage

Keep out of reach of children. Store below 25°C. For best before end, see base of carton.



Ingredients

Magnesium citrate, bulking agent (microcrystalline cellulose), capsule shell (hydroxypropyl methyl cellulose, carrageenan, potassiumacetate), Withania somnifera (ashwagandha) root extract, Matricaria recutita (chamomile) flower extract, magnesium oxide, Melissa offcinalis (lemon balm) leaf extract, anti-caking agents (magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide), vitamin B6 (as pyridoxine hydrochloride), flower essences (Clematis vitalba, Helianthemum nummularium, Impatiens glandulifera, Ornithogalum umbellatum, Prunus cerasifera and Aesculus hippocastanum (RESCUE Night®)).

title: Avène XeraCalm A.D. Lipid-Replenishing Cleansing Oil for Dry, Itchy Skin 400ml
description:
XERACALM A.D LIPID-REPLENISHING CLEANSING OIL for dry to very dry itchy skin from babies to adults.

XeraCalm A.D Lipid-Replenishing Cleansing Oil is specifically designed to gently cleanse and help replenish dry to very dry itchy skin while respecting its microbiome. Also suitable to eczema-prone skin. The oil texture seals in moisture for 24h and helps protect against the drying effect of water. The skin is left feeling comfortable and soft. Formulated with a minimal number of ingredients to minimise risks of allergy. Free from fragrance and soap and suitable for babies, children and adults Gentle on the skin: does not sting the eyes, soap and fragrance-free, physiological pH *IH kinetics, 22 subjects with dehydrated skin, one single application. **Tolerance and efficacy study on 55 subjects (adults, children, infants) under dermatological and paediatric control.

'- Nourishes the skin for 24 hours* - Reduces skin dryness and itching sensations from the 1st use** *IH kinetics, 22 subjects with dehydrated skin, one single application. **Tolerance and efficacy study on 55 subjects (adults, children, infants) under dermatological and paediatric control.

Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide. The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years. Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured. Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



Suitable for

Adults, Children, Babies



How to use

Apply to face and or body, rinse thoroughly and gently pat dry.

1. Cleanse body with XeraCalm Oil

2. Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water

3. Moisturise with XeraCalm Cream for dry, itchy skin or XeraCalm Balm for very dry and very itchy skin



Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). GLYCERIN. WATER (AQUA). HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE. DISODIUM COCOAMPHODIACETATE. DECYL GLUCOSIDE. POLYSORBATE 20. SODIUM CHLORIDE. CETEARETH-60 MYRISTYL GLYCOL. AQUAPHILUS DOLOMIAE EXTRACT. ARGININE. CITRIC ACID. COCO-GLUCOSIDE. EVENING PRIMROSE OIL/PALM OIL AMINOPROPANEDIOL ESTERS. GLYCERYL OLEATE. GLYCINE. HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE GLYCERIDES CITRATE. SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL (SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS SEED OIL). SODIUM BENZOATE. TOCOPHEROL. TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE



Active ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS I-Modulia®: a patented, powerful complex derived from Avène Thermal Spring Water, helps calm itching and irritation caused by dry skin, while helping maintain the skin's natural defence system... Cer-Omega: derived from evening primrose and rich in omega-6 and ceramides, provides exceptional hydration to help maintain the skin's epidermal barrier Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique, anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leaves the skin feeling soothed, supple and soft. STERILE COSMETICS: Allows formula to be free of preservatives, parabens and fragrance with its patented airless packaging.

title: BaByliss Straight and Curl Brilliance Rose Gold Straightener
description:
Create endless styles from sleek straight hair to beautiful bold waves and curls. Customise styles with the combination of smooth-glide titanium plates for effortless straightening and ultra-smooth stainless steel curved housing to create perfect curls. Featuring salon high heat and variable temperature settings for enhanced heat protection and long-lasting style.Super polished platesSmooth-glide true titanium ceramic plates with superior heat transfer for effortless straighteningFast resultsAdvanced Ceramics™ heating system gives super-fast heat up and maintains consistent heat on every section
Tames frizzIonic system releases frizz-controlling ions to smooth hair and add shine
Flawless curls and wavesUltra-smooth stainless steel curved housing for effortless styling
Salon high heatUp to 235°C with variable heat for lasting results
Enhanced heat protection5 temperature settings to suit all hair types



How to use

Straightening

  • Comb through dry hair and divide into sections.
  • Turn on the appliance and select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
  • Take a section of hair and place between the plates, close to the roots.
  • Hold the hair firmly between the plates and slide down the length of the hair, from root to tip.
  • Repeat as necessary.
  • Allow the hair to cool before combing through.
  • After use, switch off and unplug the appliance
  • Allow to cool before storing the appliance away.
Creating Curls
  • Ensure the cool tips are in position at the end of the appliance.
  • Turn on the appliance and select a heat setting suitable for your hair type
  • Separate a section of hair. The smaller the section the more defined the curl. The larger the section the looser the curl.
  • Take the hair section and place between the plates, roughly 3 inches from the roots.
  • Holding the appliance handle in one hand and the cool tips in the other turn the appliance 180° back on itself so that the hair is wrapped once around the outside of the appliance.
  • Slowly glide the appliance along the length of hair from root to tip in a downward motion.
  • Release the appliance from the hair.



Hazards and Cautions

  • During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface.
  • Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.



Important info

Key Features:

  • Up to 235°C
  • 28mm true-titanium plates
  • Longer styling plates for faster styling
  • Ionic frizz-control
  • 5 temperature settings
  • Ready to use in 15 seconds
  • On/off button
  • 3m swivel cord
  • Cool tips for easy, safe curling
  • Heat protection wrap
  • 5 year guarantee
What's in the box:
  • 1 x Straight & Curl Brilliance Straightener
  • 2 x Removable Silicone Cool Tips
  • 1 x Heat Protective Wrap
  • 1 x Information Booklet

title: Avène Micellar Lotion Cleanser & Make-Up Remover for Sensitive Skin 400ml
description:
This make-up removing micellar water cleanses (even pollution particles*), hydrates** and soothes sensitive face and eyes in one easy step. It contains 99% ingredients of natural origin and none of animal origin. Leaves skin clear, soft, soothed and comfortable. On a daily basis, this delicately fragranced refreshing water removes make-up and brings softness in one simple, rapid step. It improves hydration and preserves the skin's natural balance thanks to the combination of Glycerin and Trehalose, and the high concentration of Avène Thermal Spring Water with its soothing properties.  Its formula contains a minimum of ingredients at just the right amount to ensure efficacy and tolerance***. The eco-designed bottle is made of recycled plastic****, and can be recycled again. The make-up removing micellar water is suitable for contact lens wearers. 
The 400 ml Make-up removing micellar water packaging is made of 87% recycled materials. The bottle is made of 100% recycled plastic****.
* Assessment of the quantity of microparticles remaining after a single application on 27 subjects ** upper skin layers  *** Monocenter study conducted on 32 subjects with sensitive skin and eyes, applied twice daily on the face, eyes, lips and décolleté  **** excluding cap
About Avene
Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.
Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.
Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



Suitable for

All skin types |Normal skin| Sensitive skin. Eye Contour |Face| Lips| Neck| Neckline



How to use

Apply 1 to 2 times a day using a cotton pad. No-rinse.



Active ingredients

  • Trehalose



Ingredients

title: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk from Birth 800g
description:
Aptamil First Infant Milk 800g is:● Suitable from birth and nutritionally complete formula● Breastmilk substitute● Contains DHA (Omega-3)
● No Palm Oil

The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of over 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil First Infant Milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Containing DHA** (Omega-3), and made with a palm oil free blend, Aptamil First Infant milk powder is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. Our 800g pack of Aptamil First Infant Milk powder contains a scoop leveler inside the pack for more accuracy when preparing your baby’s feed. It also comes complete with a secure scoop storer to keep your hands and scoop out of the powder. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil Follow On Milk 2 is tailored for babies from 6-12 months as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil Follow On baby formula contains Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system. *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months.

As required by the legislation for all infant formula **As required by the legislation for all infant formula Aptamil 1 is inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our experts are here for you. Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.





Suitable for

Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6+ months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Powder 6-12 Months 800g.*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and UsageA Pack Designed for You
Double safety seal
To be sure your formula has not been opened and retains its freshness
Scoop leveller
To get the dose just right
Scoop storer
To keep your scoop and hands out of the power

Preparing Your Baby's Feed
Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 3; Quantity of water per feed: 90ml, 3fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 4; Quantity of water per feed: 120ml, 4fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 5; Quantity of water per feed: 150ml, 5fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6;Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx. weight: -kg, -lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months.

Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.

Prep: Wash hands and sterillise all utensils.

1 Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised bottle, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artficially softened or repeatedly boiled water,
2 Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, use the leveller on the inside of the box to level off the scoops.
3 Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill.
4 Shake: Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
5 Cool the bottle by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops in the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.

Important Feeding
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage
Store powder in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.



Hazards and Cautions

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice. If you have any queries, or you would like advice on Boots products please contact our friendly Customer Care team on 0345 609 0055.

Safety Warning:
This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.

title: Avène Cicalfate Restorative Hand Cream for Very Dry, Cracked Hands 100ml
description:
Avène Cicalfate Restorative Hand Cream for Very Dry, Cracked Hands 100mlNon-sticky, fast-absorbing hand cream to nourish, protect and repair very dry, sensitive hands.Cicalfate restorative hand cream protects and repairs very dry hands and soothes the discomfort caused by various types of aggression. Such as winter's intense climatic conditions and daily external aggressions, which can be an inherent part of certain occupations (frequent washing, use of detergents, disinfectants, grease, oils and acids etc.). Suitable for very dry, sensitive hands and also ideal for people who may be prone to eczema.Key Ingredients

  • Sucralfate: helps facilitate skin recovery process by isolating lesions from external aggressors.
  • Zinc Sulfate: helps promote and maintain a healthy skin environment for optimal recovery.
  • Zinc Oxide: helps protect from external aggressors.
  • Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique, anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed, supple and soft.

About AvèneAvène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.

For all sensitive skin

title: Anthisan Bite and Sting Cream - 20g
description:
Please note that you must be in to sign for this delivery



Suitable for

Adults and children aged 2 years and over



How to use

Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.Patient Information Leaflets are updated periodically by the manufacturer.

Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.
Patient Information Leaflets are updated periodically by the manufacturer.
  • Anthisan Bite & Sting Cream should be applied directly to the site of the insect bite, insect sting or stinging nettle rash. For best results, use as soon as possible after the bite or sting.
  • In adults and children of 2 years and above apply two to three times a day for up to three days.
Only use this medicine on your skin.



Hazards and Cautions

Do not use
  • On eczema or extensively broken skin
  • If the skin is cut or grazed
  • On areas of sunburnt skin
  • On large areas of skin
STOP using if you notice signs of skin sensitivity. These include skin redness, swelling and itching, pain or burning sensation. If symptoms worsen or do not improve after 3 days talk to your doctor or pharmacist. 
Keep all medicines out of the sight and reach of children.
Storage
Store below 30°C.
Precautions
This is a medicine; 
• Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have an underlying medical condition, are taking any other medication or complementary therapy, or if symptoms persist
• Seek advice before using if you are pregnant, planning to become pregnant, breastfeeding or suffer from allergies



Active ingredients

Mepyramine Maleate

description:

Say goodbye to scoops with Aptamil 2 Follow On Milk Pre-measured Tabs. Great for on the go, our pre-measured tabs are easy to carry and accurately measured, 1 tab = 1 scoop. Quick to dissolve, just add to water* by following the full preparation instructions. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our team of scientists have developed Aptamil Follow On baby milk, the UK’s number 1 brand for follow on milk*. Enriched with key nutrients such as Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and iron to support normal cognitive development, Aptamil Follow On Milk is tailored to complement your baby’s weaning diet between 6-12 months. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they grow.

Aptamil Toddler milk 3 is designed specially to support your baby’s growth and development from 1 year as part of a varied balanced diet, as it contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system, and normal growth and development of bone. *Each tab should be added to 30ml/1 fl.oz of water. Always follow preparation instructions **Source: IRI Infoscan Total Market MAT w/e 05/11/2022 domestic volume sales for Aptamil Follow On Milk Total UK The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process, to support your baby on their feeding journey.





Suitable for

Suitable for babies aged 6-12 months*. For 1+ years, use Aptamil 3 Toddler Milk Powder 1+ Years 800g.*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and UsageAccurately Measured
Just Add to Water*
Preparing Your Baby's Feed
Approx. 1 beaker : No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.8g): 7; Quantity of water per feed ml: 210, fl.oz: 7

After 6 months, once weaning is established, we recommend giving your baby about 1 pint (500-600ml) per day. Aptamil® follow on milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

This product is made to strick hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.

Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils.
1 Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C.
2 When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised beaker, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.
3 Powder: Tear off the top of the sachet and without touching the tabs, add the correct number to the water. Adding too many or too few tabs could make your baby ill.
4 Shake: Place the sterilised lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
5 Cool the beaker by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.

Important Feeding and Storage Advice

Do not feed babies undissolved tabs.
Handle with care. Tabs may break when dropped or held too firmly.
Make up each feed as required.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Follow the preparation instructions at all times, even when on the go.

Pre-Measured Follow On Milk Tabs

- Easy to carry, great for on the go
- Dissolves quickly, Just add to water*
- No scoop, no mess
- Easier to prepare than powdered formulations
- 1 tab = 1 scoop

*Each tab should be added to 30ml/1 fl. oz water.

Always follow preparation instructions.



Hazards and Cautions

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Storage
When you do not use all the tabs in a sachet, fold the top of the sachet.
Fasten it with a dip or store in an air-tight container. (Clip not included)
After opening the sachet, use the remaining tabs as soon as possible, within one week.
Store in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
For best before, see top of pack

title: BaByliss Big Hair 2885U Spinning Brush
description:
BaByliss Big Hair Spinning Brush 2885U The BaByliss Big Hair airstyler has an iconic rotating brush to add dramatic volume and shine to styles and replicate a salon-perfect blow-dry at home. The large ceramic barrel adds fullness and body whilst the soft mixture of natural boar and nylon bristles create ultimate smoothness and shine. The super ionic conditioning leaves hair with a frizz-free, high shine finish.With its large 50mm ceramic barrel that adds fullness and body as you dry, while the soft mixture of natural boar and nylon bristles work with the ionic conditioning system to give your hair ultimate smoothness and shine.

The built-in super ionic generator sends a stream of negative ions which act to neutralise static charges as you dry, immediately enhancing the look and feel of your hair.

2 year guarantee
Helpful Styling Tips from BaByliss
If you have long or thick hair, you may find it quicker and easier to use a hairdryer first, to rough dry your hair and remove the excess moisture. For added volume, turn your head upside down as you dry.

title: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk from Birth 200ml
description:
Aptamil First Infant Milk 200ml is:

● Ready to feed baby milk

● Suitable from birth and nutritionally complete formula

● Breastmilk substitute ● Contains DHA (Omega-3)

● No Palm Oil Product marketing: The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of over 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Containing DHA** (Omega-3), and made with a palm oil free blend, Aptamil First Infant formula is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. Our 200ml bottles of Aptamil First infant milk is ready to feed. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil 2 Follow On Milk is tailored for babies from 6-12 months as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil Follow On baby formula contains Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system. *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula **As required by the legislation for all infant formula Aptamil 1 is inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our experts are here for you.

Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



Suitable for

Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml.

*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

Preparing Your Baby's Feed Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, Single feed: 90ml, 3fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2-4 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, Single feed: 120ml, 4fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4-8 weeks, Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb, Single feed: 150ml, 5fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 8-12 weeks, Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb, Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 3-4 months, Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb, Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months, Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months, Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months, Approx. weight: -kg, -lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3
Assumes weaning at 6 months.
Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is give as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill. 1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.
2. Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding bottle.
3. Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Never leave your baby alone during feeding.



Hazards and Cautions

Contains Fish, Milk and Soya.

Storage

1. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours. 2. Any unused milk in this 200ml bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours. 3. Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place.



Important info

Important notice Breastfeeding is best. Infant milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

Made with colloidal oats, known for their skin moisturising properties, and botanical ingredients, Aveeno Gentle Moisture+ Rose Water & Chamomile Conditioner weightlessly nourishes dry hair while soothing the scalp. Hair is left lightly hydrated and with a weightless feel wash after wash.

title: Avène Very High Protection Tinted Mineral Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream for Intolerant Skin 40ml
description:
Avène Very High Protection Tinted Mineral Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream for Intolerant Skin 40mlLong lasting, tinted, SPF50, face mineral sun cream designed for the most sensitive skin.Natural tint, matt‐finish sun care fluid formulated using only mineral based filters, to provide optimum protection for even the most sensitive skin. The next generation mineral based complex provides broad spectrum defence from UVA and UVB rays, whilst remaining very water‐resistant and photostable. Uniquely formulated with antioxidant Pre‐Tocopheryl to protect skin cells from free radical damage and soothing Avène Thermal Spring Water. Includes blendable tint for a radiant, lightly covered complexion. Fragrance Free.

Key Ingredients

  • Mineral-based filters: optimum UVA-UVB protection for sensitive skin.
  • Pre-Tocopheryl : an antioxidant, Vitamin E derivative, that is more powerful, more stable, more easily absorbed.
  • Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique; anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed; supple and soft.

About Avene
Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use

Before exposure to the sun, apply the product evenly onto the skin. Re‐apply sunscreen frequently, especially after swimming or prolonged periods of exposure. Avoid exposure between noon and 4pm.

title: Avène Gentle Eye Make-Up Remover for Sensitive Skin 125ml
description:
A gentle, pH balanced eye make-up remover that removes all makeup.This gentle, fluid‐gel delicately removes even stubborn waterproof make‐up, whilst preventing the eyelid area from drying‐out. With a pH close to tears, it is perfectly well‐tolerated and does not sting or irritate the eyes. Suitable for contact lens wearers and eyelids that may be prone to irritation. Paraben free. -A gentle, pH balanced crystal-fluid gel formula that removes all makeup without drying the eyes.
-Fragrance and oil-free, is suitable for contact lens wearers and eyes prone to irritation.

Key Ingredients
- Sorbitol: hydrating agent.
- Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique; anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed; supple and soft.

About Avene
Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use

Apply the Gentle Eye Make‐up Remover to a cotton pad and delicately wipe off all traces of make‐up, starting with the eyelids then the eyelashes. Routine 1. Remove eye make-up with Gentle Eye Make-Up Remover 2. Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water 3. Moisturise using any Avène Les Essentiels or Hydrance Moisturiser of your choice



Ingredients

Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua). Triethanolamine. Sodium Chloride. Poloxamer 188. Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer. Phenethyl Alcohol. Sorbitol.Water (Aqua).

title: Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib - Grey
description:
The Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib is easy to use and designed to give your baby a safe and comfortable place to sleep. It looks stylish and fits the aesthetics of a modern home, giving it a contemporary vibe. 
The gliding motion can be operated by a parent, but it can also start on its own when your baby stirs or rolls, putting them back to sleep or a nap. Its smooth, quiet movement is great for soothing your baby to sleep. The crib can also be locked so it doesn’t glide, a useful feature as your baby gets older and is ready for their transition to a cot or cot bed. 
The crib comes with a safe reflux wedge that raises the baby to help ease the symptoms of reflux and colic.
This stand-alone crib is suitable for overnight sleep from birth up to 6 months or 9 kg.
The Babymore Air Motion Glide Crib is lightweight, making it perfect if you want to be able to move it around your home. Assembly and disassembly are very simple and quick—you can do this in less than a minute! To take it apart, just take off the small legs and fold the bassinet. No other tools are needed. The crib fits in a compact travel bag and weighs only 6 kg. You can take it with you for overnight stays as your travel cot for the first 6 months.
The crib has a perfect height of 74 cm, offering easy access to your baby anywhere in your home. The Air Motion Gliding Crib is designed to be positioned next to your bed. Its standalone design and double mesh sides ensure that you can see your baby at all times, yet they are in their own, safe sleeping space. 
The Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib has won GOLD in the 2023 Mother & Baby Awards for ‘Best Cot, Crib, or Moses Basket” category along with GOLD in the 2022 Made for Mums Awards.
We recommend the Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib fitted sheets, which are designed specifically for this crib and come in a pack of two sheets. 
Key features:
  • Gentle side to side motion, “floating on air” gliding sensation
  • Breathable mesh panels with machine washable cover 
  • Reflux wedge included 
  • Comfortable breathable fibre core mattress - chemical free with a washable cover
  • Assembles in less than a minute and is super lightweight
  • Folds away easily and quickly into a small travel bag
  • Award winning - Mother & Baby Award 2023 GOLD / Made for Mums 2022 GOLD

title: BARBER PRO Anti-Ageing Vitamin C Sheet Mask
description:
The BARBER PRO ANTI-AGEING Vitamin C Sheet Mask is an energising formula that tackles the signs of tiredness and ageing. Using the power of Blueberry, Yuzu Citrus and Sea Buckthorn, this formula will increase the skin’s hydration, brighten the complexion and reduce the appearance of dark circles, redness, fine lines and wrinkles.  

The sheet mask uses our NEW 100% Biodegradable Packaging. Our plastic pouches will also degrade to nothing more than carbon dioxide, water and biomass. This means no microplastics left behind to pose a threat to the environment. The sheet mask itself is constructed with bamboo fibres, which not only minimise skin sensitivity but also makes the mask biodegradable. 

Rich in Vitamin C, Blueberries provide vital nutrients to the cells to allow them to function to a high capacity and in turn helps your skin to appear brighter and more energised. Yuzu Fruit stimulates collagen production which renews the cells, improving elasticity and creating a smoother and more even surface. Sea Buckthorn deeply hydrates the skin as well as protecting it from environmental stressors.

Using this sheet mask weekly will help you to fight dull skin and wrinkles to achieve a bright, youthful and healthy complexion.  

The BARBER PRO ANTI-AGEING Vitamin C Sheet Mask is 100% plant based.



Suitable for

Vegans



How to use

  • 1. Cleanse the skin to prepare for mask application
  • 2. Remove the mask from the packaging and carefully unfold the mask
  • 3. Place on your face and ensure good coverage, wear for 15 - 20 minutes
  • 4. After 15 - 20 minutes has passed, remove the mask



Hazards and Cautions

External use only. Avoid contact with eyes and damaged skin. In case of eye contact, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.

title: Aptamil 2 Follow On Milk Formula Multipack 6 x 200ml
description:
Here to support your feeding journey, our ready to drink Aptamil Follow On Milk is:

  • The UK’s Number 1 brand for follow on milk*
  • Contains vitamins A and C, and with Iron for normal cognitive development
  • Contains GOS/FOS - our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides
  • Ready to drink portable bottles.


Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our team of scientists have developed Aptamil Follow On baby milk, the UK’s number 1 brand for follow on milk*. Enriched with key nutrients such as Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and iron to support normal cognitive development, Aptamil Follow On Milk is tailored to complement your baby’s weaning diet between 6-12 months. ~~Our 6 pack of easy to carry 200ml bottles of baby formula comes ready to drink, for when you’re on the go. Also available in milk powder format.

Supporting you on your baby’s journey

Your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they grow. Aptamil Toddler milk 3 is designed specially to support your baby’s growth and development from 1 year as part of a varied balanced diet, as it contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system, and normal growth and development of bone.

*Source: IRI Infoscan Total Market MAT w/e 05/11/2022 domestic volume sales for Aptamil Follow On Milk Total UK

Brand story:
The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development.

Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process, to support your baon their feeding journey.

Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood. Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby.



Suitable for

Suitable for babies aged 6-12 Months*. For 12+ Months and up to 3 Years, use Aptamil 3 Toddler Formula Milk Liquid 200ml or Aptamil 3 Toddler Formula Milk Liquid 1L. *Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and feeding guideAfter 6 months, once weaning is established, we recommend giving your baby about 1 pint (500-600ml) per day. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

  1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions

  2. Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding beaker.

  3. Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed.


Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage
  1. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding beaker as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.

  2. Any unused milk in this 200ml bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours.

  3. Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place.



Hazards and Cautions

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice. If you have any queries, or you would like advice on Boots products please contact our friendly Customer Care team on 0345 609 0055.

Important notice
Breastfeeding is best for babies. Aptamil® Follow On Milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet. It should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning including the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, midwife, health visitor, public health nurse, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby's individual needs.

Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

title: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk Starter Pack from Birth 6 x 70ml (420ml)
description:
Aptamil First Infant Milk Starter Pack 6 x 70ml is:● Pre-sterilised and ready to feed baby milk● Suitable from birth and nutritionally complete*● Contains DHA** (Omega-3)
● Made with a palm oil free oil blend
● Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science

The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of over 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil First Infant baby milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Containing DHA** (Omega-3), and made with a palm oil free blend, Aptamil First Infant formula is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. Our Aptamil First Infant Milk Starter Pack contains 6 x70ml pre-sterilised and ready to feed bottles. It also comes complete with 6 orthodontic shaped teats that screw directly onto the bottle. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil Follow On Milk 2 is tailored for babies from 6-12 months as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil Follow On baby formula contains Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system. *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula **As required by the legislation for all infant formula Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our experts are here for you.

Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.





Suitable for

Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml.*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and UsagePreparing Your Baby's Feed

Check cap before opening. Do not use if seal is broken. Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

1. Wash hands. Shake bottle well.
2. Unscrew cap, add sterilised teat.
3. Serve at room temperature or warmed if required.
4. To warm the feed, stand sealed bottle in hot water. Remember to test the temperature on your wrist before feeding the baby.

Important Feeding Advice
Before use: check best before date.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle immediately after use, and always after 1 hour.

It is recommended that Cow & Gate First Infant Milk from newborn be used only on the advice of a doctor, midwife, health visitor, public health nurse, dietitian, pharmacist or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. title: Avène Cleanance Anti-Blemish 2 Step Routine Kit
description:
A 2 step routine kit specifically formulated for oily, blemish-prone skin. A 2-step kit, providing a complete skin care routine for oily, blemish prone skin. Cleanance Cleansing Gel 200ml : Gentle cleansing gel for oily, blemish prone skin, removes impurities and make‐up whilst reducing excess sebum thanks to innovative patented active ComedoclastinTM. It also contains a high concentration of soothing and softening Avene Thermal Spring Water. Skin is left clear, refreshed, purified and mattified. Suitable for face and body. Biodegradable formula. 84% natural formula. Cleanance Comedomed 30ml : Cleanance Comedomed is a new generation product which lastingly improves the quality of your skin with efficacy from 7 days. It hydrates, mattifies, helps prevent blemishes and limits their reappearance. - Comedoclastin™:  an innovative, patented plant-based active ingredient derived from Milk Thistle, to help reduce excess sebum and prevent blemishes.

- Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique; anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed; supple and soft.  

About AvèneAvène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.





Suitable for

For all sensitive skin



How to use

Cleanance Cleansing Gel 200ml: Apply morning and/or evening to damp skin, work up a lather, rinse well then dry. Cleanance Comedomed 30ml: Apply morning and evening to the face after cleansing with Cleanance Cleansing Gel. Routine 1. Cleanse with Cleanance Cleansing Gel 2. Moisturise with Cleanance Comedomed



Important info

Benefits:

  • Simple two-step routine.
  • Hydrates, mattifies, helps reduce blemishes and limit their re-appearance.
  • Suitable for acne-prone skin for adults and adolescents.
Laboratoires Dermatologiques Avène, 45 place Abel-Gance 92100 Boulogne, Paris, France

Avene Thermal Spring Water, Comedoclastin, Butylene Glycol, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glyceride

title: Barber Pro Skin Revival Kit
description:
The Charcoal powered BARBER PRO Skin Revival Kit deeply cleanses the pores, lifting toxins from the skin and battling blackheads and breakouts.

1 x Gentlemen’s Sheet Mask 1 x Under Eye Mask 1 x Foaming Mask 1 x Face Putty Peel Off Mask

The Gentlemen’s Sheet Mask is a hydrating and rejuvenating treatment that refreshes the skin in just 15 minutes. 


The Under Eye Mask is a soothing and relaxing treatment that tackles tired and puffy eyes. The cooling formula will calm the area before rejuvenating and restoring the skin, leaving it fresh and energised.


The Foaming Cleansing Mask creates bubbles that micro massage the skin, working the ingredients into the pores and allowing them to reach well below the surface to deeply detoxify.


The Face Putty Peel Off Mask harnesses the power of Activated Charcoal to deeply cleanse, unclogging pores and lifting toxins from the skin. 



Suitable for

Suitable for all ages



How to use

1. Cleanse the area with tepid water and dry. 2. Remove mask from packaging. 3. Unfold and place over the eye zone area, using eye holes as a guide. The foil goes on the outside. 4. Relax for 20 minutes. 5. Remove and gently massage excess serum around the eye zone area.



Hazards and Cautions

External use only. Avoid contact with eyes and damaged skin. In case of eye contact, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.

title: Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib - Slate
description:
The Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib is easy to use and designed to give your baby a safe and comfortable place to sleep. It looks stylish and fits the aesthetics of a modern home, giving it a contemporary vibe. 
The gliding motion can be operated by a parent, but it can also start on its own when your baby stirs or rolls, putting them back to sleep or a nap. Its smooth, quiet movement is great for soothing your baby to sleep. The crib can also be locked so it doesn’t glide, a useful feature as your baby gets older and is ready for their transition to a cot or cot bed. 
The crib comes with a safe reflux wedge that raises the baby to help ease the symptoms of reflux and colic.
This stand-alone crib is suitable for overnight sleep from birth up to 6 months or 9 kg.
The Babymore Air Motion Glide Crib is lightweight, making it perfect if you want to be able to move it around your home. Assembly and disassembly are very simple and quick—you can do this in less than a minute! To take it apart, just take off the small legs and fold the bassinet. No other tools are needed. The crib fits in a compact travel bag and weighs only 6 kg. You can take it with you for overnight stays as your travel cot for the first 6 months.
The crib has a perfect height of 74 cm, offering easy access to your baby anywhere in your home. The Air Motion Gliding Crib is designed to be positioned next to your bed. Its standalone design and double mesh sides ensure that you can see your baby at all times, yet they are in their own, safe sleeping space. 
The Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib has won GOLD in the 2023 Mother & Baby Awards for ‘Best Cot, Crib, or Moses Basket” category along with GOLD in the 2022 Made for Mums Awards.
We recommend the Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib fitted sheets, which are designed specifically for this crib and come in a pack of two sheets. 
Key features:
  • Gentle side to side motion, “floating on air” gliding sensation
  • Breathable mesh panels with machine washable cover 
  • Reflux wedge included 
  • Comfortable breathable fibre core mattress - chemical free with a washable cover
  • Assembles in less than a minute and is super lightweight
  • Folds away easily and quickly into a small travel bag
  • Award winning - Mother & Baby Award 2023 GOLD / Made for Mums 2022 GOLD

Suitable for

From birth to 6 months or 9 kg


How to use

Instructions manual included and available on www.babymore.co.uk

title: BabaBing! Roma 2 Changing Bag - Grey
description:
BabaBing! Roma 2 Changing Bag - Grey The Roma 2 changing bag has been upgraded and designed with a more feminine silhouette that allows you to pack your changing bag with all the essential requirements you need when out and about with your child, yet still allowing you the enjoyment of carrying a stylish changing bag that blends beautifully into your own personal accessorise requirements! The Roma 2 comes with a ‘supersize’ integrated changing mat which has it's own pocket in order to allow the changing mat not to take up valuable space within the main section of the changing bag. title: BaBylissMEN The Crew Cut
description:
BaBylissMEN The Crew CutEasily cut your own hair with the specially designed self-clipper. With a precision engineered, twin blade cutting system, the BaByliss Crew Cut gives a backwards and forwards or side to side cutting action making it easy to maintain a short, all over, close cut. Powerful lithium-ion battery performance gives 75 minute cordless run time with sustained power even at lower charge levels.

  • Easy, close self-clipping
  • Lithium-ion battery for outstanding cordless performance
  • Advanced rapid charging system with 3 hour fast charge for 75 minute use or 30 minute quick charge for 15 minute use
  • Twin blade cutting system for easy, multidirectional use
  • 4 comb guides for grades 1-4 and an ear taper guide.
  • Ultra-close 0.3mm result with no guide
  • Removable and washable blades

Accessories include: 4 x cutting guides, ear taper guide, travel pouch, cleaning brush and oil



How to use

  • Switch on the clipper using the on/off sliding switch located on top of the clipper. The blades will start to move and the green LED will illuminate.
  • Starting at the nape of the neck, hold the clipper with the teeth of the clipper pointing upwards and the comb guide flat on the head.
  • Slowlymove the clipper upwards, through the hair, and towards the front of the head in a forward sweeping motion.
  • Once at the front of the head, engage the opposite blade in a backward sweeping motion to move from the front of the head, back to the nape of the neck.
  • Continue with this sweeping motion, running from the nape of the neck to the front of the head until you reach an even length all over.
  • To tidy longer hairs around the ears and neckline, simply remove the comb guide and use the blade for neatening edges and shaping
  • sideburns.



Important info

  • Dual blade cutting system for easy, multi directional self-hair cutting
  • Lithium-ion battery power
  • 75 minute cordless run time
  • 3 hour charge
  • Grades 1-4
  • super close cut 0.3mm without comb guide
  • Cleaning brush
  • Pouch

ai_summary:
Achieve the perfect crew cut at home with the BaBylissMEN The Crew Cut self-clipper. This powerful and easy-to-use clipper provides a consistently close and even cut, saving you time and money on professional barbers.

  • Powerful Lithium-ion Battery: Enjoy 75 minutes of cordless cutting power.
  • Precision Twin Blade System: Ensures smooth, multi-directional cutting for a perfect finish.

  • Easy Cleaning: Removable and washable blades for convenient maintenance.

description:

This broad spectum SPF50+ high protection is water, sweat and sand resistant.  The non-sticky,  ultra light texture is easy to apply and is tinted on the face. UVB, UVA and  Blue Light from the sun has been proven to be harmful for the skin hence the need to be protected from it. Ocean-friendly sunfilters respectful of marine biodiversity**
* Comparison of the evolution of the hydration index (IH) of the product vs untreated control after single application, 21 subjects. ** Tested according to the European classification REACH and by the Oceanological Observatory in Banyuls -sur-Mer
Key Ingredients - TriAsorB™: the first organic sun filter offering a broad spectrum protection against UVB, Short UVA, Long UVA, Blue Light (HEV). TriAsorB™ has been combined with 3 others sunfilters to create a new, 100% photostable* and ultra-efficient photoprotective system: Tinosorb S (UVB-UVA), Uvinul A+ (UVA) and Uvinul T150 (UVB). - Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique; soothing, softening and anti-irritating active that leaves the skin feeling soft and comfortable - Pre-tocopheryl: a powerful antioxidant, Vitamin E derivative. *In vitro test, UVA and UVB spectra.
About Avène Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.
Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.
Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.

Oily, blemish‐prone skin



How to use

Before exposure to the sun, apply the product evenly onto the face. Re‐apply sunscreen  frequently, especially after swimming, sweating, towel drying or prolonged periods of sun exposure. title: Aptamil Comfort Baby Milk Formula Powder from Birth to 12 Months 800g
description:
This product must be used under medical supervision. If you think your baby has colic or constipation, speak to your healthcare professional for advice. Inspired by 40 years of research in early life science, our team have developed Aptamil Comfort Milk, nutritionally complete* and tailored for the dietary management of colic and constipation. Made with reduced lactose, partially hydrolysed protein and a fat blend with beta-palmitate. Aptamil Comfort Milk is suitable from birth to 12 months. Colic: if your baby has colic, they may experience intense and inconsolable crying episodes that last several hours, a flushed face, clenched fists and legs pulled up to the chest. National Health Service (NHS). Colic (online) 2022. Available at https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/colic. Constipation: constipation usually involves your baby passing abnormally delayed, infrequent, hard or dry stools, accompanied by pain and straining. National Health Service (NHS). Constipation in children (online) 2020. Available at https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/baby/health/constipation-in-children *suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth to 6 months and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months to 1 year ** Galacto-oligosaccharides and Fructo-oliogosaccharides Aptamil is inspired by 40 years of research in early life science. Our team has developed Aptamil Comfort; nutritionally complete* and specifically tailored for the dietary management of colic and constipation. Our experts are here for you. Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen, and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



How to use

Food for special medical purposesAsk for advice from your healthcare professional before useUpdated formulation to meet new legislation.Feeding Guide
Aptamil® Comfort has a thicker texture than most other milks to help prevent your baby taking in too much air during feeding. We recommend using a variable flow teat or a single hole teat with a medium or fast flow.

Approx. age: Birth; Approx weight: 3.5kg: 7 3/4lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 3, Quantity of water per feed: 90ml, 3fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6

Approx. age: 2 weeks; Approx weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 4, Quantity of water per feed: 120ml, 4fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6

Approx. age: 2 months; Approx weight: 5kg, 11lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6, Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 4 months; Approx weight: 6.5kg, 14 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 6 months; Approx weight: 7.5kg, 16 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx weight: -kg, -lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important:
Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from the time to time. All babies are different, but it can take up to 2-3 weeks to notice a difference. If used for this time and you see no difference, we recommend you talk to your healthcare professional.

How to use this pack
To open, remove tamper evidence strip on the rim of the pack.

There is a handy leveller built into the pack. Store your scoop in the lid so that it is keep safe and secure.

Click the lid securely shut to keep your powder fresh.

Preparing your baby's feed

Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

  1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturer's instructions.

  2. Boil 1 litre of freshly run water. Leave kettle to cool for 30 minutes and no longer. Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) into a sterilised bottle. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.

  3. Using the scoop provided level off the powder with the built in leveller. Do not press/heap the powder.

  4. Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake immediately, vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until the powder is dissolved.

  5. Cool under running tap. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately.


Due to the blend of ingredients in Aptamil® Comfort, the milk can separate once prepared. If this occurs, shake the bottle vigorously to mix and use as normal. You may notice that your baby's stools change consistency when using this formula, this is completely normal.

Important feeding and storage advice
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
If necessary, offer cooled boiled water between feeds.

If your are concerned that your baby has colic or constipation you should speak to your healthcare professional.

Moving to the next stage
If you think your little one is ready to move on from Aptamil® Comfort, speak to a healthcare professional about the most suitable milk for your baby.





Hazards and Cautions

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important notice Breastfeeding is best for babies. Aptamil® Comfort is a food for special medical purposes for the dietary management of colic and constipation. It should only be used under medical supervision, after full consideration of the feeding options available including breastfeeding. Suitable for use as the sole source of nutrition for infants from birth and as part of a balanced diet from 6-12 months. For external use only. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.Ambient
