title: BaByliss Hair Straightener Berry Crush
description:
The Berry Crush 230 hair straightener with slim design and smoothing quartz-ceramic plates glide effortlessly through the hair for a salon, sleek finish.  

The professional Advanced Ceramics™ heating system heats up quickly and maintains a high heat on every section for lasting results. 

The extra-long styling plates can straighten larger sections at one time for fast results.  Perfect for longer hair types.

Choose from 10 heat settings to suit your hair type and give enhanced heat protection.

Multi-voltage features delivers top performance wherever you are.

• Up to 230°C  • Quartz-ceramic coated plates • Advanced Ceramics™ heating system maintains high heat for consistent results • 10 heat settings 140°C to 230°C • Ready to use in 30 seconds • Long-length styling plates for styling longer hair
• Multi-voltage for worldwide use
• Auto shut off
• 3m salon swivel cord
• Heat protection wrap
• 5 year guarantee

This appliance can be used by children aged from 8 years and above and persons with reduced physical, sensory or mental capabilities or lack of experience and knowledge if they have been given supervision or instruction concerning use of the appliance in a safe way and understand, the hazards involved. Children shall not play with the appliance. Cleaning and maintenance shall not be made by children without supervision.


How to use

• Ensure hair is dry and combed through to remove any tangles. Divide the hair into sections ready for styling. • Turn the appliance on and rotate the temperature dial to select a heat setting suitable for your hair type. • Place a section of hair between the straightening plates, close to the roots. • Hold the hair firmly between the plates and slide down the length of the hair, from root to tip. • Repeat for each section of hair. • Allow the hair to cool before combing through. • Switch off and unplug the appliance. • Allow the appliance to cool before storing away.


Hazards and Cautions

• WARNING! Do not use this appliance near bathtubs, showers, basins or other vessels containing water. • Do not immerse the appliance into water or other liquids. • Always inspect the appliance before use for noticeable signs of damage. Do not use if damaged, or if the appliance has been dropped. • Do not leave the appliance unattended when switched on or plugged in. • During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface, even when using the heat wrap provided. • WARNING! Only hold the handle during use. Do not touch the hot surfaces of the appliance when in use as these can be extremely hot. • Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck. • Allow the appliance to cool before storing away. • After use, do not coil the lead around the appliance as this may cause damage. Instead, coil loosely by the side of the appliance.

title: Babymoov 2 in1 Maternity Pillow Terracotta
description:
The unique 2in1 transforming maternity cushion from a U-shape to a C-shape for both pregnancy and feeding

As we know you need the very best, during your pregnancy as well as after the birth of your baby, Babymoov has designed a range of maternity pillows to meet all your needs

This collection has been really carefully thought-out with silent microbeads, super soft organic fabrics, and OEKO-TEX certification. Everything is designed to encourage relaxation and provide you with unrivalled comfort.

• Comes packed beautifully in a reusable recycled plastic bag
• Refillable (bag of microbeads sold separately)



The B. LOVE 2-in-1 pillow is a revolutionary patented innovation for parents-to-be Ultra soft with silent microbead filling, this organic cotton pillow is super comfortable. Its ingenious, user-friendly bead transferral system means you can now have 2 pillows in 1 for made-to-measure relaxation during pregnancy and feeding baby.


Comes first as a larger U-shape soft bolster pillow, perfect for supporting the back, legs and tummy during pregnancy. 


It can then be converted into a practical compact C-shape pillow for breastfeeding or bottle-feeding your baby at exactly the right height, or to provide added comfort when sat on the sofa or when travelling. Simply open the discreet zip fastening on the top, remove the cover and turn it inside out whilst evenly distributing the filling. See images/video for how it works! It only takes 30 seconds.


This 2-in-1 pillow means there's no need to buy a maternity and breastfeeding cushion, as you have both within easy reach. Plus points: as well as saving space and time, most importantly it contains extremely fine, silent and non-toxic microbeads (Toxproof-certified) so there's no compromise on comfort.


The B. LOVE range brings you unrivalled comfort with a super soft and stretchy organic cotton cover. Whether you are sitting or lying down, in bed or out and about, the pillow moulds to your body shape to create a cosy space and subtle support to reduce the impact of aches and pains. Two covers are included to fit the desired shape, ideal for keeping it clean.


Here at Babymoov, we love products that last a lifetime. That's why you can continue to use your pillow even when your baby is older, for reading or chilling out Plus, the pillow has a secure zip fastening so it can be refilled with microbeads. To take care of future generations, we are gradually changing our manufacturing methods as well as working together to embrace more environmentally-friendly practices:


- The 2-in-1 pillow is made in Europe, therefore minimising our manufacturing carbon footprint - As a hallmark of environmental responsibility, the pillow carries Oeko-Tex (R) certification to guarantee the materials used are high quality and non-toxic for your baby
- The outer covers made from super soft organic cotton are GOTS-certified (Global Organic Textile Standard)
- Toxproof-certified (non-toxic) microbeads make it silent and lightweight
- Comes in an eco-friendly reusable recycled plastic bag

• Care: Cover is machine washable at 30°C
• Pillow is hand wash only
• Not suitable for the tumble dryer
• Dimensions: U shape: unfolded: 175 cm / folded: 75 x 40 x 15 cm
C shape: unfolded: 160 cm / folded: 50 x 40 x 15 cm

To ServePreparing your baby's feed. Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions, may make your baby ill. Cap the bottle and shake vigorously for 25 seconds to dissolve the powder. Remove cap and replace with a sterilised teat. Cool under running tap. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediatelyImportant: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop may change from time to time. title: Avène Very High Protection Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream for Sensitive Skin 50ml
description:
Very high protection sun care fluid, which offers UVB, UVA, Blue Light HEV sun protection for the most exposed area: the face.
This broad spectrum SPF50+ high protection is water, sweat and sand resistant.  Non-sticky,  invisble finish and ultra-light texture for normal to combination sensitive skin. Formulated with our innovative and unique UVB, UVA and Blue Light HEV sunfilter Triasorb™, created after 20 years of Pierre Fabre research. UVB, UVA and Blue Light from the sun has been proven to be harmful for the skin, hence the need to be protected from it.
3-second absorption* Ocean-friendly sunfilters respectful of marine biodiversity** * Sensory profile      ** Tested according to the European classification REACH and by the Oceanological Observatory in Banyuls
Key Ingredients - TriAsorB™: the first organic sun filter offering a broad spectrum protection against UVB, Short UVA, Long UVA, Blue Light (HEV). TriAsorB™ has been combined with 3 others sunfilters to create a new, 100% photostable* and ultra-efficient photoprotective system: Tinosorb S (UVB-UVA), Uvinul A+ (UVA) and Uvinul T150 (UVB). - Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique; soothing, softening and anti-irritating active that leaves the skin feeling soft and comfortable - Pre-tocopheryl: a powerful antioxidant, Vitamin E derivative. *In vitro test, UVA and UVB spectra.
About Avène Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.
Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.
Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



Suitable for

Normal to combination sensitive skin



How to use

Before exposure to the sun, apply the product evenly onto the face. Re‐apply sunscreen  frequently, especially after swimming, sweating, towel drying or prolonged periods of sun exposure. Avoid exposure between noon and 4pm even while using a sunscreen product. Overexposure to the sun is dangerous. 



Ingredients

title: BaByliss Titanium Brilliance Curls Tong 32mm
description:
Designed to create soft, tumbling curls, the Titanium Brilliance Curls Tong has a 32mm super-polished titanium barrel with a spring-activated lever to gently hold your hair in place as you style for effortless results. The long length barrel and ultra-fast heat transfer give flawlessly smooth, loose curls that last, even on longer hair types. 6 digital heat settings up to 210°C offer enhanced heat protection and precise heat control. The Advanced Ceramics™ heating system ensures super-fast heat up and maintains high heat as you style for beautiful, lasting curls. Loose curls Large 32mm barrel with easy to use lever, softly holds the hair for effortless styling
Professional styling Salon-grade Advanced Ceramics™ heating system gives super-fast heat up and maintains high heat on every section for fast results
Fast results Super polished true-titanium barrel gives fast-action heat transfer for easy styling and lasting curls
Precise Heat control 6 Digital temperature settings from 160°C - 210°C for enhanced heat protection. Suitable on all hair types



How to use

  • Comb through dry hair and divide into sections.
  • Turn on the appliance and select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
  • Press the lever and place the appliance midway up a section of hair and spread the hair evenly between the lever and barrel.
  • Once the hair is in place, carefully release the lever, securing the hair between the lever and the barrel. Gently slide the appliance down to the end of the hair and wind the hair around the barrel.
  • Hold in place for 5-8 seconds, then press the lever and pull the appliance away.
  • Repeat for each section of hair.
  • Allow the hair to cool before styling.
  • After use, switch off and unplug the appliance.
  • Allow to cool before storing the appliance away.



Hazards and Cautions

  • During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface.
  • Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.



Important info

Key Features:

  • Up to 210°C
  • 32mm true titanium barrel
  • Advanced Ceramics™ heating system  
  • Extra-long barrel
  • 6 digital heat settings
  • Auto shut off
  • 2.5m swivel cord
  • Heat mat
  • 3 year guarantee
What's in the box:
  • 1 x Titanium Brilliance Curls Tong
  • 1 x Heat Protective Mat
  • 1 x Information Booklet

Anthisan Cream provides relief from insect bites, stings and nettle rash.






Suitable for

Adults and children.



How to use

Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.Patient Information Leaflets are updated periodically by the manufacturer.Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.Adults and children of 2 years and above: Apply two to three times a day for up to three days. Anthisan Cream should be applied directly to the site of the insect bite, insect sting or stinging nettle rash. For best results, use as soon as possible after the bite or sting.



Hazards and Cautions

Before you use this product:Do not use:

  • If the skin is cut or grazed.

description:
This refreshing make-up removing micellar gel cleanses (even pollution particles*), hydrates** and soothes sensitive faces and eyes in one easy step. description:

It offers three carry positions, taking you from cradling your newborn to leisurely walks out with your toddler. The carrier can be used with babies from birth with weight range of 3.5kg to a maximum12kg.It includes padded shoulder straps and lumbar support, cushioned leg openings and a back strap to help spread baby’s weight, so it can be used with comfort and ease. The padded seat and internal support promote baby’s natural spread squat in all positions, aiding their hip and spine development.

Breathable cool mesh fabric helps to keep baby cool and reduce sweating during the summer months. There’re also hi-visibility reflective strips running the height of the carrier at both sides to increase low light visibility when on for those Autumn / Winter strolls or even crossing the road.

Front Facing Position - From birth, in the front-facing position, your baby benefits from close contact and interaction with you.

Outward Facing Position - When they’re around three months old or can hold up their own head, the outward facing position (with the adjustable head cushion removed and neck support folded over) lets them explore the world around them.

Back Carrying Position - When your little once is feeling more confident, you can convert to the back carrying position.





Hazards and Cautions

  • The babyway 3 in 1 baby carrier is suitable for babies from birth with a weight of 3.5kg to 12kg.
  • Your child must face towards you until he or she can hold their head upright (about 4 to 5 months old).
  • Hold your baby closely at all times until the buckles are correctly attached.
  • Make sure your baby is properly positioned with their legs straddling the seat.

  • Check all buckles and adjustments are secure before each use.

  • Pull all straps closely around you.Always make sure there is enough room around baby’s nose and mouth to provide clear air.Never lie down with your baby in the baby carrier.

  • Inspect the baby carrier regularly for any signs of wear and tear.

  • Your child MUST be able to sit upright unassisted to use the backpack position (about 6 months old).

  • Small children can fall through a leg opening. Adjust leg openings to fit baby’s legs snugly.

  • Care instructions can be found on the label on the baby carrier.

  • NEVER leave your child in the carrier unless it is being worn, as your child may suffocate or fall.

  • DO NOT use in exercise activities or motorised vehicles.

  • DO NOT bend over at your waist; bend at the knees. To be carried by adults while standing or walking only.

  • DISCONTINUE use if damaged, broken or parts are missing.

  • Check REGULARLY that your child is secure, comfortable, that their face is uncovered and that they are breathing freely.

  • For low birthweight babies and children with medical conditions, seek advice from a health professional before using this product.



Important info

Country of Origin: Ireland

Address: Babyway International Ltd, Neptune Way, Huddersfield, HD2 1UA

All hair types

Prep the hair by brushing each section and applying appropriate heat defence and styling products.

title: Aptamil Advanced 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml
description:
• Aptamil Profutura is now Aptamil Advanced Follow Milk
  • Ready to Drink
  • UHT sterilised
Our Most Advanced Formulation* to Complement a Weaning Diet
*Contains iron to support normal cognitive development



Suitable for

Suitable for Babies aged 6-12 Months*.*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation & UsagePreparation and feeding guide:
Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.
Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb; Single feed: 90ml, 3fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb; Single feed: 120ml, 4fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb; Single feed: 150ml, 5fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx weight: 5.4kg, 12lb; Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb; Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb; Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb; Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx weight: -kg, -lb; Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.
2. Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding bottle.
3. Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed.

Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage:
1. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
2. Any unused milk in this 200ml bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours.
3. Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place.



Hazards and Cautions

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important information: Breastfeeding is best Follow On Milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet.It should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning including the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby’s individual needs.

When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby’s teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby’s teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night

title: Aveeno Soothing Bath Soak 42g - 8 sachets
description:
Made with 100% Natural Colloidal Oat - a long-recognised ingredient that helps to naturally relieve itchy sensations, Aveeno Soothing Bath Soak gently moisturises, relieves and soothes very dry, itchy and irritable skin. Use Aveeno Soothing Bath Soak for a warm, comforting bath that helps to calm soothe your dry irritable skin. It is suitable for sensitive and even for eczema prone skin. Aveeno Soothing Bath Soak comes in bath powder sachets (these are not intended for individual resale). Try Aveeno Dermexa Body Wash or Dermexa Daily Emollient Cream for very dry itchy, also eczema prone skin. About the brand: Dating all the way back to Ancient Egypt, oat has been used as an ingredient in skincare for generations. It is known for its ability to soothe and nourish the skin. The first ready to use Aveeno colloidal oatmeal bath treatment was used in 1945 and has been perfected ever since to help provide care for all skin, even the most sensitive.



Suitable for

Adults



How to use

Pour into running water, stir the product until completely dissolved making sure there is no oatmeal settled in the bottom of the bath to avoid slipping For best results, soak in the bath for 15 minutes and up to 30 minutes Do not rinse off, pat your skin dry to keep a thin layer on the skin. After your bath, apply moisturiser. Soaking for too long may dry your skin.



Hazards and Cautions

External use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with water. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid inhalation. 



Ingredients

Avena Sativa Kernel Flour (Oat) [PR-3640]

Made with our unique blend of GOS/FOS***, Omega-3, calcium and vitamins A and C, Aptamil Toddler Milk also contains iron to support normal cognitive development. Our 1L cartons of Aptamil Growing Up Milk come ready to drink. *As required by the legislation **As recommended for toddlers by the Department of Health (UK)/Food Safety Authority of Ireland ***A blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our patented blend of ingredients and unique process to support your baby on their feeding journey. Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood.

Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



How to use

To Serve Your toddler will need about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil Growing Up milk a day, as part of a balanced diet. Aptamil Growing Up milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 1 year onwards. Preparing your toddler's drink. Shake the carton of Aptamil Growing Up milk before opening. Pour the required amount of milk into a clean beaker. Aptamil Growing Up milk can be given at room temperature or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of drink. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the beaker as soon as possible and always within 2 hours. Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding. Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Storage Once opened, unused Growing Up milk still in this carton must be refrigerated immediately and used within 72 hours. Best Before: see top of carton.



Hazards and Cautions

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is always as accurate as possible, food products are regularly improved and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result we recommend that you always read the label carefully before using or consuming any products. Nutritional Reference Value (NRV) information is based on the typical composition of the product. Guideline daily amounts are those for a typical adult (men and women). NRV information for non Boots products is calculated by the manufacturer. Boots has no control over the recipe or nutritional content of such products and information on this site may differ to that given on the product label. We would therefore recommend you do not solely rely on this information and always read the product label. If you have any queries, or you would like advice on Boots products please contact our friendly Customer care team on 0345 609 0055. This information was last updated 01/06/2016

title: Avène Hydrance Rich-UV Hydrating Cream SPF30 Moisturiser for Dehydrated Skin 40ml
description:
A rich hydrating cream with SPF30 protection for dry to very dry sensitive skin.Rich, softening daily moisturiser to instantly restore hydration reservoirs. Provides 24-hour hydration leaving skin immedialty refreshed and radiance whilist preventing wayer from evaporating from the skin.  Hydrates your skin while protecting it against UVA-UVB rays, free radicals, and pollution. Smoothness and luminosity are restored and fine dehydration lines are minimised. Specifically designed for dry to very dry sensitive skin -Cohederm™: an innovative, patented, active ingredient that helps restore natural hydration levels in the skin, offering longer-lasting results than hyaluronic acid.Key IngredientsAvène Thermal Spring Water: 37%, unique; anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed; supple and soft.
Shea Butter: moisturising and nourishing agent.
Pre-Tochoperol: powerful antioxidant to protect against free radicals.
About AvèneAvène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use

Apply in the morning to a cleansed face and neck. Routine 1. Cleanse with Gentle Milk Cleanser 2. Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water 3. Prep with Hydrance Intense Rehydrating Serum 4. Moisturise in the morning with Hydrance Rich-UV Cream SPF30 5. Moisturise in the evening with Hydrance Rich Cream



Hazards and Cautions

For external use only.

title: bareMinerals BAREPRO 16hr Skin-Perfecting Powder Foundation
description:
BAREPRO 16HR Skin-Perfecting Powder Foundation is a talc-free, natural matte foundation that provides 16 hours of breathable full coverage, while visibly evening skin tone and texture over time.

This skin-improving sweat, humidity and transfer-resistant pressed powder foundation provides 24 hours of oil and shine control. The non-drying, non-caking formula can be used wet or dry depending on your skin type or application preference. The formula is dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, clean, vegan and cruelty free.

Key Ingredients PINEAPPLE COMPLEX: Helps visibly brighten, and smooth skin texture. PEONY EXTRACT & SUGARCANE-DERIVED SQUALANE: Helps hydrate and nourish for smoother, more even skin.

Research Results • Skin tone looks more even in just 2 weeks*

* Based on a 4-week consumer study of 47 people. **Based on a 4-week clinical study of 47 people.



Suitable for

All ages



How to use

Use wet or dry. 

FOR A DRY APPLICATION Apply this formula dry with the included sponge or the Luxe Performance Brush (sold separately). This application is ideal for balanced, combination or oily skin, or for on-the-go use.

FOR A WET APPLICATION If you have dry skin, use a damp sponge or brush to get the creamiest application. 


PRO TIP (for wet application): Allow 30 seconds for powder to dry down to its natural matte finish before applying additional makeup as the shade may appear richer and more vibrant when applied wet.


To Wet the Sponge or Brush SPONGE
1. Soak the sponge under cool water until it expands.
2. Squeeze out any excess water in a towel so the sponge is damp, not soaked.


BRUSH 1. Dip the brush head into cool water (avoid soaking the barrel of the brush).
2. Squeeze out any excess water in a towel so the brush is damp, not soaked.

3. Press the sponge or brush onto the powder.
4. Sweep the product across your face, starting where you want the most coverage and blending outward in long strokes. 



Important info

Clean, vegan, talc-free + formulated without parabens, formaldehyde, synthetic fragrance, gluten and more.

title: BaBylissMEN Japanese Steel Digital Clipper
description:
The  BaBylissMEN Digital Japanese Steel Hair Clipper is a stylish, yet powerful hair clipper for exceptional cutting performance and effortless cutting on all hair lenghts. Create various hair styles from an on-trend fade or just a simple classic short back and sides, the choices are endless.  Long lasting cordless useLithium-ion power delivers long lasting, powerful, cordless use for up to 160 minutes from only a 3 hour charge.Japanese Steel Japanese Steel blade technology provide exceptional cutting performance for smooth and effortless trimming
Lenght ControlUp to 45 different lengths with 8 easy, click on comb guides and a 5 position easy, twist taper guide, allowing you to make small adjustments for the perfect fade and making the art of blending different lengths as easy as possible.
How to use

  • Attach the longer comb guide as required for the top of your hair – your clipper is supplied with 8 comb guides (grades 1-8). Each comb guide is labelled.
  • Switch the clipper on and the blades will start to move.
  • Hold the clipper to the front of your hair with the teeth pointing towards the back of your head and move the clipper towards your crown. Repeat as necessary, moving in rows from the front and the sides of your head to the back.
  • If you then wish to take the back and sides of your hair to a shorter length, switch off the appliance and attach a shorter comb guide.
  • Starting at the nape of the neck, with the comb guide flat against the head, move the clipper upwards and outwards over the area you want to take shorter.
  • Repeat on the sides of the hair, starting with the teeth of the clipper pointing upwards and comb guide flat against the area above the ear, again moving the clipper upwards and outwards.

title: Babyliss Deep Waves Waver
description:
Create must-have beautiful waves. An easy to use styler that creates luxurious waves in seconds. Simply clamp a section of hair in-between the large tourmaline-ceramic barrels for instant texture with a beautiful shiny finish.Easy To Use


How to use

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE

  • Ensure the hair is dry and combed through to remove any tangles.  Divide the hair into sections ready for styling.
  • Press the button marked ‘I/0’ to switch the appliance on.
  • Slide the switch to select the suitable heat setting for your hair type.
The LED indicator light will flash until optimum temperature has been reached. Once temperature has been reached the LED light will stop flashing.
  • Take a section of hair and place between the top barrels and bottom plate of the appliance.
  • Clamp the hair between the top barrels and bottom plate by pressing the appliance together.
  • Hold in place for 5-8 seconds. Take care to avoid the hot surfaces of the appliance coming into contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.
  • Release the appliance from the hair and gently slide down to the next section. Re-position the appliance to overlap the last wave created, to ensure a continuous wave effect in the hair.
  • Continue this action down the entire hair section, towards the ends of the hair.
  • Allow the section to cool before styling. Repeat on each hair section.
  • After use, press the button marked ‘I/0’ to switch off and unplug the appliance.
  • Allow to cool before storing away.

Hazards and Cautions

  • Do not use the appliance in the bathroom.
  • WARNING! Do not use this appliance near water contained in basins, bathtubs or other vessels.
  • Do not immerse the appliance in water or other liquids. Do not leave the appliance unattended when switched on or plugged in.
  • During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface even when using the heat mat provided.
  • Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.

Important info

Box Contains:

  • 1 x BaByliss Deep Waves
  • 1 x Salon Heat Wrap
  • 1 x Information Booklet

title: BaByliss Flawless Volume Hot Air Styler
description:
BaByliss Flawless Volume Hot Air StylerAchieve dramatic volume, fullness and shape to all styles with the 38mm hot air brush. Frizzy hair is tamed with ionic conditioners to smooth hair cuticles as you style.Volumising hot air brush

• 500W• 38mm titanium-ceramic barrel• Mixed bristles for ultimate styling• Ionic frizz-control
• 2 heat settings
• Cool setting
• 2.2m swivel cord
• 3 year guarantee



How to use

• Once the hair is 80% dry, you can start styling the hair.• Use a hairbrush to remove any tangles from the hair and create your parting ready for styling.• Turn the airstyler on by sliding the switch to the heat setting suitable for your hair type.
• Take a section of hair and place the brush head under the section of hair, as close to the roots as possible.
• Use the brush head to lift the hair at the roots as you style.
• Move the airstyler down along the hair section. As you reach the ends of the hair, rotate the airstyler slightly away from your face to curl the ends under.
• Repeat as necessary.
• After use, switch off and unplug the appliance.
• Allow to cool before storing away.



Hazards and Cautions

• Do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface whilst in operation.• Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the ears, eyes, face and neck.

title: Aptamil Anti-Reflux Baby Milk Formula Powder from Birth to 12 Months 800g
description:
Inspired by 40 years of research in early life science, our team have developed Aptamil Anti-Reflux Milk, nutritionally complete* and specifically designed for the dietary management of frequent reflux and regurgitation. Made with Carob Bean Gum to help your baby’s feeds stay down, Aptamil Anti-Reflux is nutritionally complete* and suitable from birth to 12 months. If you think that your baby has frequent reflux or regurgitation, speak to your healthcare professional. This product should not be used in combination with antacids or other thickeners and is not suitable for premature babies. *suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth to 6 months and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months to 1 year. Aptamil is inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our team have combined our blend of ingredients with our unique process to develop Aptamil Anti-Reflux baby milk, tailored for the dietary management of frequent reflux and regurgitation. Our experts are here for you. Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen, and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



How to use

Moving to the next stage If you think your little one is ready to move on from Aptamil® Anti-Reflux, speak to a healthcare professional about the most suitable milk for your baby. Feeding Guide Aptamil® Anti-Reflux is a thickened feed. We recommend using a single hole fast flow teat. Feeding Guide Approx. age: Birth, Approx. weight 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 3, Quantity of water per feed 90ml, 3fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2 weeks, Approx. weight 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 4, Quantity of water per feed 120ml, 4fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2 months, Approx. weight 5kg, 11lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 6, Quantity of water per feed 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4 months, Approx. weight 6.5kg, 14 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 7, Quantity of water per feed 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 6 months**, Approx. weight 7.5kg, 16 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 7, Quantity of water per feed 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 7-12 months, Approx. weight - kg, - lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 7, Quantity of water per feed 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3 **Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice. Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time. How to use this pack To open, remove tamper evidence strip on the rim of pack. There is a handy leveller built into the pack. Store your scoop in the lid so that it is kept safe and secure. Click the lid securely shut to keep your powder fresh. Preparing your baby's feed Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill. 1 Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions. 2 Boil 1 litre of freshly run water. Leave kettle to cool for 45 minutes and no longer. Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) into a sterilised bottle. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water. 3 Using the scoop provided level off the powder with the built-in leveller. Do not press/heap the powder. 4 Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle. Hold the bottle horizontally and shake from left to right for 10 seconds, then hold it vertically and shake from top to bottom for 10 seconds. The time between adding the scoops and shaking the bottle should be as short as possible. 5 Leave the bottle to stand for 5 minutes to allow it to thicken. Turn the bottle upside down just before feeding. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately. You may notice that your baby's stools change consistency when using this formula. This is completely normal. Important feeding advice Make up each feed as required. For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours. Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed. Never leave your baby alone during feeding.



Hazards and Cautions

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice. If you have any queries, or you would like advice on Boots products please contact our friendly Customer Care team on 0345 609 0055.Food for Special Medical Purposes Ask for advice from your healthcare professional before use If you are concerned that your baby has frequent reflux or regurgitation you should speak to your healthcare professional. Aptamil Anti-Reflux should not be used in combination with antacids or other thickeners and is not suitable for premature infants. Important notice Breastfeeding is best for babies. Aptamil® Anti-Reflux is a food for special medical purposes for the dietary management of frequent reflux and regurgitation. It should only be used under medical supervision, after full consideration of the feeding options available including breastfeeding. Suitable for use as the sole source of nutrition for infants from birth and as part of a balanced diet from 6-12 months. This product should not be used in combination with antacids or other thickeners and is not suitable for premature infants. For enteral use only. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.Store powder in a cool, dry place Do not refrigerate Use powder within 4 weeks of openingAmbient

title: Babymoov Nutribaby Opal Green 6 in 1 Baby Food Maker
description:
The multifunctional food prep maker for varied, healthy & tasty meals.

• 6-in-1 multi-purpose baby food processor (pre-programmed functions): steam cooking, blending, defrosting, sterilising and heating baby bottles and heating baby food jars • Adaptable: food suitable for weaning your baby as well as for the whole family • Several meals can be prepared in a single cycle: 2.2 litre capacity (1,500 ml for cooking, 700 ml for blending)  • Saves time: a food processor that blends and cooks at the same time or separately – it's up to you!


The Nutribaby(+) multi-purpose food prep machine is ideal for all stages of your child's development, from bottle-feeding to weaning and beyond. This multi-purpose food processor features 6 automatic programmes, with 1 button = 1 function: steam cooking, blending, defrosting, heating baby food jars, sterilising and heating baby bottles. 
This food processor also features a central touchscreen console and a built-in timer (audible and visual alarm, automatic cut-off) making it super easy to use.


 Its 2 separate baskets guarantee food is steam-cooked to a turn, with all its flavours and vitamins preserved. Its 3 blending speeds along with its cooking water vessel mean you can adjust the texture as you wish, depending on your baby's age.


With its 2,200 ml capacity (1,500 ml for cooking and 700 ml for blending), you can prepare several meals in a single cycle!


As a baby food expert, Babymoov has been designing unique multi-purpose food prep makers for over 25 years: the best loved Nutribaby range! For the very first time, it's now possible to cook and blend at the same time. You can cook all types of foods: fruit and vegetables, meat, fish, eggs, grains, starches, etc. A real time-saver for new parents looking to give their children healthy, tasty home-made meals.


The Nutribaby(+) multi-purpose food prep maker is ideal for all stages of your child's development, from bottle-feeding to weaning and beyond. The multi-purpose Nutribaby(+) features 6 automatic programmes, with 1 button = 1 function: steam cooking, blending, defrosting, heating baby food jars, sterilising and heating baby bottles. This food processor also features a central touchscreen console and a built-in timer (audible and visual alarm, automatic cut-off).


With 2 separate cooking baskets, Nutribaby+ guarantees food is steam-cooked perfectly, with all natural flavours and nutrients preserved. Its 3 blending speeds along with the cooking water vessel mean you can adjust and adapt the texture of your foods, at each stage of the weaning process. You can then add even more flavour and vitamins using the cooking water captured in the separate vessel


• Composition: BPA-free Tritan, polypropylene • Care: Baskets, bowls and accessories are dishwasher-safe
• Wattage: Heating 230V / 500W and Blending: 230V / 3 speeds
• Power supply: Mains operated (adaptor supplied)
• Product dimensions: 39.5 x 25 x 31.5 cm

title: Bambaw Bamboo Cotton Buds - Pack Of 200
description:
Bambaw Bamboo Cotton Buds - Pack Of 200Cotton buds are convenient and ordinary, so it is easy to forget about their impact on the environment. But we love using them: It has been estimated that we used over 500 billion of these worldwide in 2017.Sadly, most are made of plastic, which needs centuries to break down. In the meantime, animals mistake it for food, which eventually kills them.
A sustainable alternative to plastic is bamboo. Bamboo cotton buds are biodegradable while being as sturdy and durable as the plastic version. So, they are the perfect alternative.



How to use

Use the bamboo cotton bud as a conventional cotton bud. Afterwards, you can dispose of it in your personal or local compost. A detailed digital user manual is provided.



Hazards and Cautions

Do not insert in your nose or ear canal



Important info

Country of origin: CN

title: Aptamil Follow On Milk 6-12 Months 2 x 600g (1.2kg)
description:
Key features/benefits: Here to support your feeding journey, Aptamil Follow On Milk powder big pack is:

• The UK’s Number 1 brand for follow on milk*

• 2x600g pack format

• Contains vitamins A and C, and with Iron for normal cognitive development

• Contains GOS/FOS - our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our team of scientists have developed Aptamil Follow On baby milk, the UK’s number 1 brand for follow on milk*. Enriched with key nutrients such as Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and iron to support normal cognitive development, Aptamil Follow On Milk is tailored to complement your baby’s weaning diet between 6-12 months. Our 1.2kg pack of Aptamil Follow On baby formula comes in a pack of 2 x 600g. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they grow. Aptamil Toddler milk 3 is designed specially to support your baby’s growth and development from 1 year as part of a varied balanced diet, as it contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system, and normal growth and development of bone.

*Source: IRI Infoscan Total Market MAT w/e 05/11/2022 domestic volume sales for Aptamil Follow On Milk Total UK The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process, to support your baby on their feeding journey.

Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood. Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



Suitable for

6-12 Months



How to use

Preparation and Usage Preparing Your Baby's Feed Approx. 1 beaker: No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.8g) 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml / 7 fl.oz After 6 months, once weaning is established, we recommend giving your baby about 1 pint (500-600ml) per day. Aptamil® Follow on Milk is formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice. Important: always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop may change from time to time.
How to Use This Pack
Inside the box are two foil sachets and a scoop to measure the correct amount of powder. For ease, remove one foil sachet from the box and store it until required. Open the other sachet with scissors, cutting along the top. To dose, carefully fold the open end of the foil sachet over. To maintain the best quality, we recommend using a clip* to reseal the sachet.
*Clip is not included.


1 Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils.

2 Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised beaker, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly bolled water.

3 Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, level off the powder with a clean, dry knife. Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill.

4 Shake: Place the sterilised lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.

5 Cool the beaker by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and finishing within 2 hours.

Important Feeding and Storage Advice
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.



Hazards and Cautions

This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill. Important notice Breastfeeding is best. Follow-on milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet. If should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning including the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby's individual needs. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.



Important info

Allergy Information
For allergens, see ingredients in bold.
Storage
Store powder in a cool dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.

Manufactured in the E.U.

title: Aptamil Advanced 2 Follow On Formula Baby Milk Powder 6-12 Months 800g
description:
Aptamil® Advanced Follow On Milk, our most advanced formulation* (*contains iron to support normal cognitive development) helps meet the increasing nutritional needs of babies aged 6-12 months. The beginning of your baby's life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of more than 500 scientists and experts are devoted to bringing you and your baby the latest scientific discoveries our research has to offer. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research we have gone a step further to develop Aptamil® Advanced Follow On Milk, which is suitable in combination with breastfeeding or for formula feeding. Supporting you on your baby's journey - Aptamil® Advanced Toddler Milk is tailored for toddlers from 1 to 3 years as part of a varied, balanced diet.

  • Our unique blend of GOS/FOS and 2'FL**
  • Essential fatty acids ALA and LA for normal growth and development***
  • No artificial preservatives‡

** GOS/FOS and 2'FL - our blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides with 2'-Fucosyllactose. ***Benefit obtained from a daily intake of 2g ALA ad 10g LA ‡ As required by the legislation Every Little Step Counts

  • Factory is 100% powered by renewable electricity and sends zero waste to landfill
  • Fully recyclable pack. Click the scoop back into the lid before recycling.

We are devoted to providing you and your baby our very best. We don't produce for any supermarket own-label brands.



Suitable for

Situable for Babies aged 6-12 Months*. For 12+ Months and up to 3 Years, use Aptamil Advanced 3 Toddler Formula Milk Powder 800g.

*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

Preparing Your Baby's Feed Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill. Aptamil® Advanced Follow On Milk helps meet the increased nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months. This information is given as a guide only. Approx. 1 beaker: No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.8g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7 fl.oz

  1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.
  2. Boil 1 litre of freshly run water. Leave kettle to cool for 30 minutes and no longer. Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) into a sterilised beaker. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.
  3. Using the scoop provided, level off the powder with the built in leveller. Do not press/heap the powder.
  4. Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Place the sterilised lid on the beaker and shake immediately, vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds until the powder is dissolved.
  5. Cool under running tap. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately.

Important Feeding Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.

title: Babymoov Lovenest Original antibacterial head support natural care
description:
Babymoov Lovenest Original antibacterial head support natural careLovenest Natural Care - the newborn organic cotton head support pillow promotes the healthy development of a well-rounded head within the first 3 months while baby's skull is still soft! Developed and patented by French Paediatrician Dr Maidenberg, the anti-flat head pillow , is specially angled and shaped to suit the shape of an infant's skull to ensure an even distribution of pressure across the back of the head, while still allowing freedom of movement. During the first months of their life, your baby can spend hours on their back.To reduce the risk of flat head (plagiocephaly) from forming, use a Lovenest pillow under baby’s head on an activity mat, in their cot, pram or even a baby bouncer. Unique to the Lovenest Natural Care which is made in Portugal, it is specifically designed for newborn babies with a weak immune system. The copper thread, which is woven into the organic cotton mesh, eliminates 99.9% of bacteria, reduces odours, and protects the skin from infections. This exclusive patented technology is 100% natural and involves no chemical treatments atall. The Lovenest Natural Care is machine-washable at 30°C without damaging the anti-bacterial properties of the copper thread. Use the Lovenest Natural Care straight from birth and up to 3 -4 months old or until baby is able to roll over unaided.



Hazards and Cautions

It can be used from birth to 3 monthsStop using the head support once the child is able to turn over unaided



Important info

Country of Origin: Portugal

Address: 3rd Floor, East Reach House, East Reach, Taunton, TA1 3EN – www.babymoov.co.ukParc Industriel des Gravanches, 16, rue Jacqueline Auriol, 63051 Clemont-Ferrand Cedex 2, France – www.babymoov.com
ai_title: Babymoov Lovenest Natural Care: Antibacterial Baby Head Support

title: Babymoov Cosydream Original
description:
Babymoov Cosydream OriginalSleep is precious!After spending nine months in your tummy, your newborn may feel unsettled by their new surroundings. They need to adapt from a fœtal position in which they felt safe and protected to a lying position stretching their unused and undeveloped abdominals. These new sensations may disrupt sleep and, consequently, development.



Hazards and Cautions

IMPORTANT! Read carefully and keep for future reference.WARNINGStop using the product once your baby is 3 months old, or starts to roll over unaided, or is too big to fit into it properly. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.Do not use pillows, blankets, or additional padding underneath or beside the infant. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
Do not use this product in an adult bed. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
Do not use this product at height. RISK OF FALLING.
Remove the child before moving the product.
Beware of the danger of placing the cot near naked flames and other sources of intense heat such as gas or electric heaters.
Stop using the product once the child starts moving around and wanting to turn over. This is because the child's movements may cause them to roll off the product and onto their side, or end up with their face against the mattress in a position where they cannot breathe.
Medical opinion states that babies gain this ability to move at around 3 months, but users should be reminded of the importance of preempting this and looking out for their child gaining these new skills.
Using the product beyond the indicated age can have serious consequences for the child.
Check that all parts of the product are correctly assembled before use.
Do not use the product if any components are broken or missing.
Right from birth, place your baby on their back, flat, in their own cot with a firm mattress. Never place them on their tummy or side.
Up to the age of 6 months, parents are recommended to sleep in the same room as their baby, placing the cot next to their bed. It is recommended to place your baby in their cot on their own, on a firm mattress the same size as the cot. No items should be placed in their cot: no cot bumpers, blankets, duvets, pillows, toys, or soft toys.
Ensure that the child’s chin does not rest on their chest by ensuring that two adult fingers can fit in the space between the chin and the torso, so that their breathing is not impeded.
Take into account the temperature of the room and the nightwear worn by the child, and ensure that the child is neither too hot nor too cold; excessive heat can endanger the life of your child. A temperature of 19°C is recommended. The air in the bedroom must not be too humid or too dry, and the room should be ventilated every day to provide fresh air.
Ensure that the belt does not press on the child's abdomen and thorax by ensuring that two adult fingers can fit in the space between the belt and the child's body.
It is designed to keep the child in position when they unexpectedly start to move for the first time, but it must not be used under any circumstances to restrain a child whose motor skills mean that they are too old to be placed in the product.



Important info

Country of Origin: China

Address: 3rd Floor, East Reach House, East Reach, Taunton, TA1 3EN – www.babymoov.co.ukParc Industriel des Gravanches, 16, rue Jacqueline Auriol, 63051 Clemont-Ferrand Cedex 2, France – www.babymoov.com

title: Aptamil First Infant Milk from Birth 2 x 600g (1.2kg)
description:
Aptamil First Infant milk 2 x 600g (1.2kg):

● Big pack 1.2kg

● Suitable from birth and nutritionally complete*

● Contains DHA** (Omega-3)

● Made with a palm oil free oil blend

● Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of over 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil First Infant baby milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Containing DHA** (Omega-3), and made with a palm oil free blend, Aptamil First Infant formula is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. Our big pack 1.2kg contains two 600g foil sachets inside the box and a scoop to measure the correct amount of powder. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil Follow On Milk 2 is tailored for babies from 6-12 months as part of a varied, balanced diet.

Aptamil Follow On baby formula contains Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system. *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula **As required by the legislation for all infant formula Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our experts are here for you. Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen, and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



Suitable for

0-6 Months



How to use

Preparation and Usage Preparing Your Baby's Feed Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.5 kg, 7 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 3; Quantity of water per feed: 90 ml, 3 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.9 kg, 8 1/2 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 4; Quantity of water per feed: 120 ml, 4 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.7 kg, 10 1/2 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 5; Quantity of water per feed: 150 ml, 5 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx. weight: 5.4 kg, 12 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180 ml, 6 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx. weight: 6.2 kg, 13 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180 ml, 6 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx. weight: 6.9 kg, 15 1/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx. weight: 7.6 kg, 16 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx. weight: - kg, - lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 3


Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.
Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.



How to Use this Pack
Inside the box are two foil sachets and a scoop to measure the correct of powder. For ease, remove one foil sachet from the box and store it until required. Open the other sachet with scissors, cutting along the top. To close, carefully fold the open end of the foil sachet over. To maintain the best quality, we recommend using a clip∞ to reseal the sachet.
∞Clip is not included.



This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.
1 Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils.

2 Water: Boil1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised bottle, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.

3 Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, level off the powder with a clean, dry knife. Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill.

4 Shake: Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.

5 Cool the bottle by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and finishing within 2 hours.

Important Feeding
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.



Hazards and Cautions

Important notice Breastfeeding is best. Infant milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.
Contents may settle in transit. The scoop may become submerged in the powder, please use a clean, dry knife to find it.

Allergy Information 
For allergens, see ingredients in bold
Storage
Store powder in a cool dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening. Best before: see base of box.

title: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk from Birth 1L
description:
Our patented formulation Breastmilk Substitute Ready to feed UHT sterilised

Aptamil® First Infant Milk is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable for babies from birth.

Our Nutritionally Complete Formula* Contains DHA** (Omega-3) *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula. **as required by the legislation for all infant formula.



Suitable for

Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml.

*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

Preparing Your Baby's Feed Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, Single feed: 90ml, 3fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2-4 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, Single feed: 120ml, 4fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4-8 weeks, Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb, Single feed: 150ml, 5fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 8-12 weeks, Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb, Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months, Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb, Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months, Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months, Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months, Approx. weight: -kg, -lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3
Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill. 1 Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.
2 Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding bottle.
3 Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed.

Important Feeding Advice For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.



Hazards and Cautions

Contains Fish, Milk and Soya.

Storage

Any unused milk in this 1L bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours. Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place. Best Before: see below



Important info

Safety Warning

Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Important notice

Breastfeeding is best. Infant milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

title: Babymoov Moov & Boost Baby Carrier Sage
description:
The ergonomic baby carrier which converts into a booster seat - designed with a French Physiotherapist.

 Patented and designed in conjunction with a French physiotherapist, Camille Rieu • Adaptable: converts into a booster seat using an ingenious system of detachable straps and an inflatable cushion (10cm thick)

An ergonomic baby carrier that converts into a booster seat. There is no compromise on comfort, health and safety as this adaptable baby carrier was designed in conjunction with Camille Rieu, a physiotherapist specialising in the development of children's motor skills and a mother to 2 children herself. 

As a parent, it always feels disorganised and rushed whenever you need to go out with your baby – then there’s the fear of forgetting something and not having enough space. Make life easier by just taking one item with you for mealtimes as well as travelling.  With an ingenious patented system of detachable straps and an inflatable cushion, it takes less than 5 minutes to convert your baby carrier into a secure booster seat! And since we really have thought of everything, the Moov & Boost baby carrier converts into a shoulder bag so it's really easy to carry.


Its ingenious A-line shape moulds to your baby's body shape, and can be used for babies weighing up to 20 kg. It keeps your baby's back in a rounded shape and guarantees they are carried in the healthy 'frog' position which is best for their hips. This baby carrier means you can carry your baby in three ergonomic positions: on your front, back or side. If you would like to start carrying your baby from birth (weight 3kg to 5kg), you will need our newborn insert (sold separately). 


This Moov & Boost baby carrier is also designed with the carrier's body shape in mind. It has a really comfortable design with padded straps and reinforced abdominal belt. 


And because the action we take today shapes the future of our children, Babymoov is committed to reducing its environmental impact, whilst protecting their sensitive skin:  - The ergonomic baby carrier is made from high quality, soft and water-repellent 100% organic cotton canvas. 
- At the back, breathable recycled polyester mesh provides good ventilation so that baby can be carried all year round. 
- The booster seat fabric is also made from recycled polyester.


Product tested in accordance with the strictest baby equipment standards and certified as "hip-friendly" by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute. 


Through experience, we know that baby likes to grab the straps and chew on them, which is why we have added a detachable silicone teething ring.
The Moov & Boost baby carrier has lots of other ingenious accessories, such as a hood to protect baby from the rain and UV rays, 3 storage pockets for carrying the booster seat section and other essential items for your trip, and a shoulder clip for attaching a handbag or tote bag to keep your hands free!

Composition:  Main fabric: 100% organic cotton 
Mesh: 100% recycled polyester 
Suedette: 100% polyester ​​
Foam: 100% polyurethane​ 
Booster seat lining: 100% recycled polyester


Care: Machine washable at 30°C (except for the inflatable cushion and teething ring)


Dimensions:  60 x 45 cm 
Folded: 45 x 15 x 5 cm



Important info

Maximum wieght 20kg

title: BaByliss Super Styler Straightener
description:
The BaByliss Super Styler hair straightener, delivers ultimate straightening performance with pioneering  Micro Heating Matrix™ heater technology for long lasting smoothness even when styling at lower temperatures. 2500 micro heaters fully cover the surface of the plate to ensure perfect even heat coverage with no hot spots for flawless, effortless smoothing. The microprocessor monitors the temperature 50 times a second, precisely regulating every micro heater to ensure fast, consistent heat and rapid cool down. Ultra fast heat recovery for a perfect finish on every section. 

With a curved housing design that also easily creates smooth curls with lasting hold. Features:

  • Up to 200°C 
  • Patented Micro Matrix heating system 
  • Ceramic coated plates 
  • Floating plates 
  • 5 heat settings
  • Auto shut off  
  • Sleep mode 
  • Multi-voltage 
  • Audio & LED indicator 



Suitable for

All hair types.



How to use

  • Ensure hair is dry and combed through to remove any tangles. Divide the hair into sections ready for styling.
  • Turn the appliance on.
  • Select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
  • Place a section of hair between the straightening plates, close to the roots.
  • Hold the hair firmly between the straightening plates and slide down the length of the hair, from root to tip.
  • Repeat for each section of hair.
  • Allow the hair to cool before combing through.
  • After use, turn off and unplug the appliance.
  • Allow the appliance to cool before storing away.

Our Team Suggests:  Shake well to ensure mineral pigments are evenly dispersed. For a defined line • Use the side of your brush and glide in short strokes along the upper lash line — starting above your iris, working outward, and stopping where your natural lashes end. • Use the remaining product on your brush to complete the line, gliding from the inner corner towards the center of your eye to create a smooth, saturated line. For a cat eye look: • Use the side of your brush and glide in short strokes along the upper lash line — starting above your iris, working outward, and stopping where your natural lashes end. • Glide the brush from your inner corner, moving towards the center of your eye to create a solid line. • Flip your brush, and extend the line slightly past the outer eye corner. Follow the angle of your lower lash line to ensure your wing is properly positioned and symmetrical on both sides. • For a more dramatic look, apply liner just below your lower lash line, working from the outer corner inward. Please note: you can use either liquid or pencil liner on the lower lash line. For a dramatic winged look: • Use the side of your brush and glide in short strokes along the upper lash line — starting above your iris, working outward, and stopping where your natural lashes end. • Glide from your outer corner towards the inner corner, moving towards the center of your eye to create a solid line. • Reapply eyeliner over the existing line to thicken and enhance, extending it past your outer eye corner until you’ve achieved the desired height. • Next, flip the brush and glide it inwards toward the center of your eye to create an outline of a wing with a bolder line. Fill in any exposed skin for a rich black winged eye.

title: Avène Thermal Spring Water Spray for Sensitive Skin 50ml
description:

Dolomiae, which gives Avène Thermal Spring Water a unique, naturally soothing and anti-irritating properties.Key Ingredients

More Than 150 Studies Prove Its Efficacy
Reduces skin sensitivity by -31% after 5 minutes, by -65% during the first week*

*Study conducted on over 6,300 subjects
About AveneAvene is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use
