title: Aptamil Pre-Measured Tabs First Infant Milk from Birth 24 x 23g (552g)
description:
Aptamil Pre-measured Tabs First Infant Milk (24 sachets):

● Accurately measured – 1 tab = 1 scoop.

● Just add to water*

● Easy to carry

● 24 sachets each containing 5 tabs.

● Suitable from birth and nutritionally complete**

● Contains DHA*** (Omega-3) & made with a palm oil free Our pre-measured tabs are easy to carry and accurately measured, 1 tab = 1 scoop. Aptamil 1 Pre-measured tabs contains 24 sachets each containing 5 tabs. Just add to water by following the full preparation instructions. The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of over 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil First Infant Milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Containing DHA** (Omega-3), and made with a palm oil free blend, Aptamil First Infant formula is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil Follow On Milk 2 is tailored for babies from 6-12 months as part of a varied, balanced diet.

Aptamil Follow On baby formula contains Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system. *Each tab should be added to 30ml/1 fl.oz of water. Always follow preparation instructions. **Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula ***As required by the legislation for all infant formula Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our experts are here for you. Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen, and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



Suitable for

Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6+ months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Tabs 6-12 Months (120 Tabs)

*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

Preparing Your Baby's Feed Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 3, Quantity of water per feed: 90ml, 3fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2-4 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 4, Quantity of water per feed: 120ml, 4fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4-8 weeks, Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 5, Quantity of water per feed: 150ml, 5fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 8-12 weeks, Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 6, Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 3-4 months, Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 6, Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months, Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months, Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months, Approx. weight: -kg, -lb, No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3
Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

1 Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils. 2 Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised bottle, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.
3 Powder: Tear off the top of the sachet and without touching the tabs, add the correct number to the water. Adding too many or too few tabs could make your baby ill.
4 Shake: Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
5 Cool the bottle by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.

How to Store Your Tabs When you do not use all the tabs in a sachet, fold the top of the sachet.
Fasten it with a clip or store in an air-tight container. (Clip not included)
After opening the sachet, use the remaining tabs as soon as possible, within one week.

Important Feeding Advice Do not feed babies undissolved tabs.
Handle with care. Tabs may break when dropped or held too firmly.
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra tabs or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
Follow the preparation instructions at all times, even when on the go.

Pre-Measured First Infant Milk Tabs - Easy to carry
- Just add to water*
- Accurately measured
- Simply air-compressed
- 1 tab = 1 Scoop
*Each tab should be added to 30ml/1fl. oz water.
Always follow preparation instructions.



Hazards and Cautions

Contains Fish, Milk and Soya.

Storage

Store in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate. Keep tabs out of reach of children. For best before, see top of pack.



Important info

Important Notice Breastfeeding is best. Infant milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

description:

Our Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk is suitable for combination feeding or for formula feeding.

A Pack Designed for You Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk Starter Pack contains: - 6 ready to feed bottles of Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk - supplying approx. 24 hours worth of feeds - 6 orthodontic shaped teats - for optimised flow, which screw directly onto the bottle - Pre-sterilised - ready to use with no preparation required The beginning of your baby's life is a special and beautiful time. Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science, our passionate team of more than 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk, which is suitable for combination feeding or for formula feeding. Also Available: Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk is also available in 200ml ready to feed and 800g powder format.



Suitable for

Suitable for babies from birth and aged 0-6 Months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil Advanced 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml.

*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation & Usage

Preparing your baby's feed Check Cap Before Opening. Do Not Use if Seal is Broken. Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

  1. Wash hands. 
  2. Shake bottle well.
  3. Unscrew cap, add sterilised teat.
  4. Serve at room temperature or warmed if required.
  5. To warm the feed, stand sealed bottle in hot water. Remember to test the temperature on your wrist before feeding the baby.

Important feeding and storage advice

  • Before use: check best before date.
  • Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
  • Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
  • For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle immediately after use, and always after 1 hour.
  • Bottles and teats for single use only.

title: Avène  Tolerance Hydra10 Hydrating Fluid 40ML
description:
This high tolerance moisturiser made with 100% natural ingredients for normal to combination skin is suitable for adults, children and infants. TOLERANCE HYDRA-10 Fluid promotes the skin's natural moisture and contributes to its daily comfort. It is formulated to be microbiome friendly  thanks to its patented  formula**inspired by the skin's composition.  Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, its formula intensely hydrates the skin for 48 hours*. The anti-contamination Sterile Cosmetic pump perfectly protects its formula, without preservatives or fragrances. The comfortable and nourishing texture of this normal to combination skin face cream, leaves the skin without any greasy effect, moisturises lastingly. 

•  HYDRATES continuously for 48H* • MICROBIOME FRIENDLY thanks to its patented formula • RESPECTS the skin with a high tolerance formula made from ingredients of 100% natural origin

*After 7 days of use. Instrumental test after 7 days, twice a day application. 30 subjects. **Patent registered. *Instrumental test after 7 days, twice a day. 30 subjects. Patent registered.

About Avene Avene is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avene offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



Suitable for

Combination skin, Dehydrated skin, Normal skin



How to use

Apply morning and evening to the face, neck and eye contour area.

title: BARBER PRO Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Sheet Mask

How to use

To create a ‘W’ shape on your face, begin at the centre peak for a naturally sun-kissed look: Hold the tip of the brush towards the outer bridge of the nose, sweep the product down to the apple of the cheek and then up toward the temple. Connect the “W” by sweeping the remaining product continuously from cheek, over the nose, to other cheek . At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.

title: Babymoov Babyni Anti-UV Playpen 50+ SPF Protect - Mariniere
description:
"Why will you love it?

• High anti-UV protection (SPF 50+) • Play area and tent • Removable fine mesh mosquito net • Pop-up system for easy folding and unfolding • Detachable canopy • Comfortable mattress
• Storage bag with shoulder strap included""Summer’s finally arrived! So there’s only one thing you want to do - go out with your baby! 

Before the age of one, babies do not produce enough melanin to protect them from the sun’s UV rays. So when you go out, it’s essential to protect your little one with high protection sun cream, sunglasses, a hat... So your baby can explore the world around them in complete safety, whether on the beach, in the park or even in the mountains. 

The Babyni is an anti-UV travel cot and playpen that protects your baby from the sun’s rays as well as from wind, sand and insects. With its high protection (SPF 50+), it blocks up to 99% of harmful rays (UVA and UVB). 

The Babyni is easy to assemble and store away thanks to its pop-up system, and can be used right from birth.  When it is set up, your little one can lie comfortably on the thick mattress and play or rest.

The Babyni has a removable canopy and a fine mesh mosquito net. To protect your baby from insects, the net is elasticated and is easily attached with 2 Velcro strips.

The Babyni is versatile - you can use it both outdoors (beach, park, countryside, etc.) and indoors. There are 2 loops for attaching your toys above your baby.  And when your baby grows, you can fold down the canopy and turn the Babyni into a ball pit, for example. 

Really practical, the Babyni folds away easily in its carry bag. You can take it anywhere!"

title: Avène Hydrance Aqua-Gel Moisturiser for Dehydrated Skin 50ml
description:
3-in-1 hydration moisturiser for dehydrated skin, sensitive skin.This all‐in‐one moisturiser fits all hydration needs and all rhythms of life. Used as a day care,  night mask and along  the eye contour, it moisturizes, soothes and detoxifies the skin to restore its initial freshness. The unique gel‐in‐cream formula upon contact with the skin, breaks into water leaving skin intensely hydrated, dewy and smooth. Suitable for all dehydrated, sensitive skin types. Key IngredientsCohederm™: an innovative, patented, active ingredient that helps restore natural hydration levels in the skin, offering longer-lasting results than hyaluronic acid.
Pre-Tocopheryl: a Vitamin E derivative. This powerful antioxidant helps to protect skin from free radicals.
Dextran Sulfate: decongests and soothes puffy skin around the eyes.
Avène Thermal Spring Water: 75%, unique; anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed; supple and soft.
About AveneAvène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use

In the morning, apply to the face, neck and eye contour. In the evening, apply a thick layer and leave on all night. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Routine 1. Cleanse with Mattifying Cleansing Foam 2. Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water 3. Prep with Hydrance Intense Rehydrating Serum 4. Moisturise using any Hydrance Aqua-Gel



Hazards and Cautions

For external use only.



Important info

Labororatoires Dermatologiques Avene, 45, place Abel-Gance, 92100 Boulogne, Paris France



Ingredients

Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua). Glycerin. Pentylene Glycol. 1,2-Hexanediol. Dimethicone. Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate. Triethylhexanoin. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Betaine. Methyl Gluceth-20. Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate. Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer. Bht. Bis-Peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane. C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside. C14-22 Alcohols. Carbomer. Citric Acid. Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil (Cucurbita Pepo Seed Oil). Fragrance (Parfum). Phytosterols. Potassium Hydroxide. Sodium Citrate. Sodium Dextran Sulfate. Sodium Hyaluronate. Squalane. Tocopheryl Glucoside. Water (Aqua).

title: Apothecary Small Scented Candle Fresh Start 70g
description:
Zingy combinatio of citrus & ginger blended expertly with delicate aromas and musk is just what is needed for a Fresh Start.



How to use

Remove all packaging before use.



Hazards and Cautions

Never leave a burning candle unattended. Keep Burn candle out of reach of children and pets. Always leave at least 10cm between burning candles. Do not burn candles on or near anything that can catch fire. T his container may get hot during use. Protect surfaces which may be damaged by heat or dripping wax. Do not move a burning or recently extinguished candle. Burn away from draughts. Keep wax pool clear of matches and other debris to avoid flaring. Extinguish carefully if flame becomes enlarged - do not blow out. Never allow the flame to contact the glass. Candles may produce some soot; to minimise this, regularly trim the wick to 10m. Extinguish carefully when there is at least 6mm of wax remaining. Do not replace the lid when flame is alight. Pick candle up around the glass jar. May produce an allergic reaction.



Important info

title: bareMinerals The Original Get Started 4-Piece Mineral Make Up Set
description:
A makeup starter kit featuring mini sizes of our best-selling loose mineral makeup essentials for a healthy-looking complexion.

Discover the benefits of mineral makeup and reveal your best radiant complexion with this must-have starter kit — featuring mini sizes of our iconic ORIGINAL Loose Mineral Foundation in your shade, plus a foundation brush, smoothing face primer, and talc-free finishing powder.



How to use

STEP 1: PREP • Squeeze a pea size amount of PRIME TIME™ Original Pore-Minimising Primer into the palm of your hand and warm up. • Smooth a thin, even layer over skin, starting in the centre of your face. • Allow to absorb into your skin before applying foundation. STEP 2: PERFECT • Use the Beautiful Finish Brush to SWIRL, TAP, BUFF® for an easy, expert application: o SWIRL a small amount of ORIGINAL Loose Mineral Foundation in the lid until it all disappears into the brush. o TAP away excess. o BUFF onto the skin in a circular motion, starting on the outside of your face and moving inward. o Repeat until you’ve achieved the desired coverage, from sheer to full. STEP 3: SET • Using a fluffy brush, such as our Supreme Finisher Brush (sold separately), sweep MINERAL VEIL® Finishing Powder across T-zone, cheeks or all over your face.



Important info

Mini PRIME TIME™ Original Pore-Minimising Primer • Preps skin for makeup and improves the look of bare skin* • Extends makeup wear up to 12 hours* • Reduces the appearance of pores* *Based on average results from an Independent U.S. clinical study of 36 people Mini ORIGINAL Loose Mineral Foundation SPF 15 • Talc-free powder foundation made with just 5 mineral ingredients • Breathable, buildable sheer-to-full coverage with a naturally luminous finish • Promotes clearer, healthier-looking skin over time • Dermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic, non-acnegenic and hypoallergenic Mini Beautiful Finish Brush • Ultra-soft vegan, synthetic bristles with a unique convex center • Expertly holds loose minerals for fast and even application • Quickly builds coverage from sheer to full Mini MINERAL VEIL® Finishing Powder • Talc-free face powder • Sets and locks makeup in place • Blurs the look of pores and fine lines • Dermatologist-tested

title: Avène Thermal Spring Water Spray for Sensitive Skin 300ml
description:
A unique Thermal Water Spray to calm, soothe and soften sensitive skin.Essential multi-use spray to refresh, calm and soften the skin, whilst soothing any sign skin sensitivity. Can be used for sunburn, nappy area, peri-ocular dryness, skin tightness, itching caused by dryness, after cleansing, after skincare routine or to fix make-up. Suitable for all types of sensitive skin and the whole family, including babies from 6 months old. Proven efficacy, over 12 years of research have revealed the secret behind these properties: a unique microflora, Aqua. Dolomiae, which gives Avène Thermal Spring Water a unique, naturally soothing and anti-irritating properties.

  • Unique Avène Thermal Water Spray is bottled directly at the source and packaged in a sterile environment for guaranteed purity.
  • The water is clinically proven to soothe, soften, and calm even the most sensitive skin, due to the low mineral content and neutral pH that reduces sensitivity and restores skin balance.
Key Ingredients
  • Avène Thermal Spring Water : low mineral content and neutral pH, that reduces sensitivity and restores skin balance.
  • More Than 150 Studies Prove Its Efficacy
  • Reduces skin sensitivity by -31% after 5 minutes, by -65% during the first week*

*Study conducted on over 6,300 subjects
About AveneAvène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source, from which our products derive, has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use

Hold upright and do not shake. Spray onto the skin in a fine mist and leave on for 2 to 3 minutes. Then gently pat dry using a tissue. Use as often as necessary. Routine 1. Cleanse using any Avène Cleanser 2. Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water 3. Moisturise using any Avène Moisturiser of your choice



Ingredients

Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua). Nitrogen.

title: AVEENO® Baby Dermexa Emollient Cream, 150ml
description:
AVEENO Baby Dermexa™ Emollient Cream is specially formulated for babies with very dry, itchy skin who are more prone to regular irritation and itchiness. Enriched with ceramides, an essential component of the skin structure, the formula helps to strengthen the skin barrier function.

AVEENO Baby Dermexa™ Emollient Cream contains our highest concentration of oat extract*, oat oil and prebiotic oatmeal for healthy looking, more resilient skin from Day 1. It is free from parabens and can be applied to the whole body twice a day.  *versus all other AVEENO® Baby products.

This Emollient Cream comes in a recyclable carton, which is FSC certified.

For a complete routine use with AVEENO Baby Dermexa™ Moisturising Wash, and for long lasting comfort at night use AVEENO Baby Dermexa™ Good Night Emollient Balm.

At AVEENO® Baby we carefully select high quality oats to preserve their protective, moisturising and soothing properties. 



Suitable for

FOR VERY DRY, ITCHY SKIN: Babies with very dry, itchy skin are more prone to regular irritation and itchiness. Also suitable for little ones who may be prone to eczema



How to use

Apply to the whole body at least twice a day. For a complete routine use with AVEENO Baby Dermexa™ Moisturising Wash. And for long lasting comfort at night, apply AVEENO Baby Dermexa™ Good Night Emollient Balm to help soothe dry, itchy feeling skin.



Hazards and Cautions

Keep out of reach of children. For external use only.



Important info

  • WITH OUR HIGHEST CONCENTRATION OF OAT EXTRACT*, OAT OIL AND PREBIOTIC OATMEAL: the formula leaves healthy looking, more resilient skin from day 1. *versus all other AVEENO® Baby products
  • WITH TRIPLE OAT COMPLEX & CERAMIDES: Enriched with ceramides, an essential component of the skin structure, the formula helps to strengthen the skin barrier function.
  • FREE FROM PARABENS
  • RECYCLABLE CARTON

title: Aptamil 2 Follow On Milk 6-12 Months 800g
description:
Here to support your feeding journey, Aptamil Follow On Milk powder is:

• The UK’s Number 1 brand for follow on milk* • Contains vitamins A and C, and with Iron for normal cognitive development

• Contains GOS/FOS - our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our team of scientists have developed Aptamil Follow On baby milk, the UK’s number 1 brand for follow on milk*. Enriched with key nutrients such as Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and iron to support normal cognitive development, Aptamil Follow On Milk is tailored to complement your baby’s weaning diet between 6-12 months. Our 800g pack of Aptamil Follow On baby formula contains a scoop leveler inside the pack for more accuracy when preparing your baby’s feed. It also comes complete with a secure scoop storer to keep your hands and scoop out of the powder. Also available in ready to drink liquid format. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they grow. Aptamil Toddler milk 3 is designed specially to support your baby’s growth and development from 1 year as part of a varied balanced diet, as it contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system, and normal growth and development of bone. *Source: IRI Infoscan Total Market MAT w/e 05/11/2022 domestic volume sales for Aptamil Follow On Milk Total UK The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process, to support your baby on their feeding journey. Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood.

Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



Suitable for

Suitable for babies aged 6-12 months*. For 1+ years, use Aptamil 3 Toddler Milk Powder 1+ Years 800g.

Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparing Your Baby's Feed Approx. 1 beaker: No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.8g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl.oz After 6 months, once weaning is established, we recommend giving your baby about 1 pint (500-600ml) per day. Aptamil® Follow On Milk is formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

1 Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils. 2 Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised beaker, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water. 3 Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, use the leveller on the inside of the box to level off the scoops. Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill. 4 Shake: Place the sterilised lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved. 5 Cool the beaker by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.

Important Feeding Advice Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage

Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.



Hazards and Cautions

Contains Fish, Milk and Soya.

Storage

Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.



Important info

IMPORTANT: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop may change from time to time.

This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions, on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.

Important notice Breastfeeding is best. Follow-on milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet. It should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning including the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby's individual needs. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.



Ingredients

Ingredients
Dairy-Based Blend (of which 29% is Fermented) [Lactose (from Milk), Vegetable Oils (High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Coconut Oil, Rapeseed Oil, Sunflower Oil), Skimmed Milk, Demineralised Whey (from Milk), Whey Concentrate (from Milk), Calcium Phosphate, Fish Oil, Potassium Chloride, Potassium Citrate, Choline Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Vitamin C, Calcium Carbonate, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Inositol, Magnesium Chloride, Vitamin E, Antioxidant (Vitamin C), Pantothenic Acid, Nicotinamide, Thiamin, Riboflavin, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Potassium Iodide, Vitamin K1, Biotin, Vitamin B12]

title: BaByliss Rose Quartz 38mm Curling Hair Tong
description:
BaByliss Rose Quartz 38mm Curling Hair Tong

Effortlessly achieve soft, loose waves with the BaByliss Rose Quartz 38mm Curling Tong.

  • Large 38mm barrel

  • Up to 210°C
  • 6 digital heat settings
  • Extra-long barrel
  • On/off button
  • Auto shut off
  • 2.5m swivel cord
  • Heat mat
  • 3 year guarantee



How to use

  • Pressing the lever, place the barrel midway up a section of hair and spread the hair evenly between the lever and barrel.
  • Once the hair is in place, carefully release the lever, securing the hair between the lever and the barrel. Gently slide the barrel down to the end of the hair.
  • Wind the hair around the barrel at a slight angle, so the hair wraps around the barrel in a spiral motion. 
  • Hold in place for 5-8 seconds, depending on your hair type.
  • To remove the barrel from the hair, press the lever and pull the styler away.
  • Repeat for each section of hair.
  • Allow the curl to cool before styling.



Hazards and Cautions

  • During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface.
  • Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.
  • This appliance must not be used in the bathroom.
  • Do not use the appliance near water contained in basins, bathtubs or other vessels.

title: Aptamil Stage 4 Toddler Milk 2-3 Years 800g
description:
Contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system Tailored to support toddler's nutritional needs Vitamins A, C, D, calcium, iron, omega-3, nutri fibres (GOS/FOS) Palm Oil Free Oil Blend

Inspired by 50 Years of Early Life Nutrition Research The beginning of your toddler's life is a special and beautiful time.
Our passionate team of more than 500 scientists and experts have developed our Aptamil® Toddler Milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life nutrition. Our formulation contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and is tailored to support your toddler's nutritional needs from 2+ years.
Aptamil® Toddler Milk is tailored to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers aged 2+ years.  

Nutri Fibres GOS/FOS - Our blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides
Immunonutrient
Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system
Omega-3 LCPs
Vitamins A & C and iron
Iron supports normal cognitive development

No artificial preservatives* *as required by the legislation.

Supports a Toddler's Healthy Start* 2 Beakers a Day
2 x 150ml
Provides 100% of the recommended daily amount of vitamin D for toddlers*

*Calcium for normal growth and development of bone
Iodine to help support the normal growth of children
*Reference Nutrient Intake/Recommended Dietary Allowance as recommended for toddlers by the Department of Health (UK)/Food Safety Authority of Ireland



Suitable for

Suitable for toddlers aged 2-3 Years.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

A Pack Designed for You To open, remove tamper evidence strip on the rim of the pack. There is a handy leveller built into the pack. Store your scoop in the lid so that it is kept safe and secure. Click the lid securely shut to keep your powder fresh.

Preparing Your Toddler's Drink We recommend giving your toddler about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil® Toddler Milk a day, as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil® Toddler Milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 2 years onwards. 1 beaker: No. of level scoops per drink (1 scoop = 4.4g): 5; Quantity of water per drink: 150ml, 5fl oz

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time. This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your toddler ill.

1 Water: Measure 150ml or 5fl.oz of boiled, cooled water into a clean beaker. 2 Powder: Using the scoop provided, add 5 levelled scoops of powder into the beaker. Do not press/heap the powder.
3 Shake: Place the clean lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
4 Check temperature and drink immediately.

Important Feeding Advice Make up each drink as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up drinks, discard unfinished drinks as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your toddler's drink.
Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding.



Hazards and Cautions

Contains Fish, Milk and Soya.

Storage

Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening. Best Before: see above



Important info

Dental advice Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice.



Ingredients

Dairy-Based Blend (of which 25% is Fermented) [Skimmed Milk, Lactose (from Milk), Vegetable Oils (Rapeseed Oil, Sunflower Oil, High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Coconut Oil), Whey products (Demineralised Whey, Whey Concentrate) (from Milk), Calcium Phosphate, Fish Oil, Potassium Citrate, Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Chloride, Vitamin C, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Choline Chloride, Inositol, Magnesium Chloride, Pantothenic Acid, Vitamin E, Antioxidant (Vitamin C), Riboflavin, Nicotinamide, Vitamin B6, Thiamin, Potassium Iodide, Folic Acid, Vitamin K1, Biotin, Vitamin B12] Maltodextrin Galacto-Oligosaccharides (GOS) (from Milk) Fructo-Oligosaccharides (FOS) Magnesium Hydrogen Phosphate Ferrous Sulphate Milk Flavouring Zinc Sulphate Vitamin A Vitamin D3 Allergies For allergens, see ingredients in bold. description:
The BARBER PRO Skin Renewing Foil Mask offers a self warming treatment that intensely hydrates and restores the skin, ensuring it feels replenished and free of the signs of fatigue.   • Restorative
  • Anti-ageing

This energising treatment will help you to battle the signs of tiredness and ageing through stimulating collagen production. This helps to enhance the skin's elasticity and tone, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and ensuring the face feels moisturised and firm. Hyaluronic Acid is a key ingredient for powerfully increasing the hydration of the skin, binding water to the cells and helping nutrients to circulate throughout. Q10 energises the skin, stimulating it to repair and renew.

Suitable for all ages

  2. Remove mask from packaging.

title: BaByliss Super Smooth Wide Straightener
description:
The BaByliss Wide professional straightener with a top temperature of 235°C with ultra fast heat up has  wider plates with ceramic coating to give a salon-perfect, smooth finish, ideal for straightening longer or thicker hair.Ultra-Fast StylingThe Advanced Ceramics™ heating system gives ultra-fast heat up and gives consistent heat on every sectionFor Thicker Longer HairWider plates to straighten larger sections of hair at one time for quick results

How to use

  • Ensure hair is dry and combed through to remove any tangles. Divide the hair into sections ready for styling.
  • Turn the appliance on.
  • Select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
  • Place a section of hair between the straightening plates, close to the roots.
  • Hold the hair firmly between the straightening plates and slide down the length of the hair, from root to tip.
  • Repeat for each section of hair.
  • Allow the hair to cool before combing through.
  • After use, turn off and unplug the appliance.
  • Allow the appliance to cool before storing away.



Hazards and Cautions

  • During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface.
  • Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.

title: BaByliss Hydro-Fusion Anti-Frizz 2100 Hair Dryer
description:
BaByliss 2100W Hydro-Fusion dryerThe BaByliss 2100W Hydro Fusion hair dryer is designed to deliver both fast drying and superior smooth results with radiant shine. The Advanced Plasma Technology uses a moisture balancing dual ionic system that combines both positive and negative ions, that work together to hydrate the hair and to eliminate frizz as you dry.  Your hair is left feeling silky and conditioned with luxurious shine.The plasma effect

  • Hair feels soft and conditioned
  • Hair has no more frizz
  • Hair is exceptionally smooth
  • Hair looks shiny and radiant

Also includes a specially designed plasma flow diffuser that dries and forms luxuriously soft and shiny natural curls and a slim salon concentrator that gives a streamlined airflow for a smooth finish.



How to use

  • Gently towel dry and detangle wet hair.
  • Plug the appliance into a suitable mains socket.
  • Select the required heat and speed settings.
  • Use the high heat and speed settings for initial drying and the lower heat and speed settings to finish drying and for styling.
  • For additional control when styling, attach the concentrator nozzle and using the lower heat and speed settings, direct the airflow along the surface of the hair from root to tip. Use a brush to give smooth added volume.
  • To set your desired style use the cool shot button and gently blow cool air onto your warm hair.
  • To enhance natural curls and boost volume attach the plasma flow diffuser and set the speed and heat on low and scrunch hair from ends to roots. Be careful not to hold heat on hair for too long to avoid damage.
  • After use, switch off and unplug the appliance. Allow to cool before storing away.



Hazards and Cautions

  • Do not use the appliance in the bathroom.
  • WARNING! Do not use this appliance near water contained in basins, bathtubs or other vessels.
  • Do not immerse the appliance in water or other liquids. Do not leave the appliance unattended when switched on or plugged in.
  • During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface.
Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.



Important info

Key Features:

  • 2100W
  • Powerful airflow for fast drying
  • Advanced Plasma Technology with moisture balancing dual ionic system
  • Lightweight for easy handling
  • 3 heat / 2 speed settings
  • Cool shot
  • Large plasma-flow diffuser for soft natural curls
  • Slim concentrator nozzle for a smooth blow-dry
  • Removable rear filter for easy cleaning
  • 2.5m power cord
  • 3 year guarantee

title: BaBylissMEN i-Stubble3 Beard Trimmer
description:
BaBylissMEN i-Stubble 3 Beard Trimmer15 ultra precise length settings let you maintain your preferred facial hair style at all times. Whether you’re looking for a short, shadow look, a longer stubble look, or even a short beard, the i-Stubble+ is the ultimate in stubble control.Features
• Advanced comb guide for extra precision
• Flexing, contouring head tracks the curves of your face for extra comfort and control
• Motorised length control for precise adjustment
• 15 lenght settings between0.4mm to 5.0mm with ultra precise 0.2mm
• Memory length function
• LCD Screen displays selected length and battery charge level
• Skin friendly electro-chemically formed precision blades technology for extreme precision and sharpness
• 90 minute charge provides 45 minutes of cordless, high power

- Flexing, contouring head for exceptional accuracy and comfort- 15 motorised lengths for ultimate precision- 0.4mm-15mm- LCD Screen displays selected length and charge time remaining
- Protective comb guide delivers ultimate length consistency
- Rapid charging system
- 90 minute charge provides 60 minutes of cordless use
- Shaver style power lead and 3 pin plug adaptor
- 3 year guarantee



How to use

Set the cutting length as required.

  • It is always best to start cutting with a longer length first, then trim again if the length is longer than desired.
  • Hold the iStubble3 against the hair, the teeth of the comb guide should be pointing upwards and should be flat against the face.
  • Move the trimmer upwards through the hair, a little at a time, against the direction of hair growth. The floating and contouring head will follow the curves of your face to ensure both accuracy and comfort.
  • The iStubble will work most effectively when cutting through the hair at its own speed – never force through the hair. You may experience a little resistance when trimming the neck area, where hair is thicker and grows in many different directions. This is completely normal.
  • Just like shaving, extra time should be given when trimming under the neck area, as again this is where hairs grow in many different directions.
  • Never switch the trimmer off whilst in the hair.

description:
Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk, suitable for babies from birth Nutritionally Complete* (*suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. Click the scoop back into the lid before recycling. We are devoted to providing you and your baby our very best. We don't produce for any supermarket own-label brands. Nutricia and Aptamil® are registered trademarks. Packaged in a protective atmosphere. Contents may settle in transit.



Suitable for

Suitable for babies from birth and aged 0-6 Months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil Advanced 2 Follow On Formula Baby Milk Powder 6-12 Months 800g.

*Breastfeeding is best.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

A Pack Designed for You Triple safety seal To be sure your formula has not been opened and retains its freshness Secure latch closure Extra safety against contaminations and spills Scoop storer
To keep your scoop and hands out of the power

Preparing Your Baby's Feed Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.
Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 3; Quantity water per feed: 90ml, 3fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 4; Quantity water per feed: 120ml, 4fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 5; Quantity water per feed: 150ml, 5fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6; Quantity water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6; Quantity water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 weeks; Approx. weight: -kg, -lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.

  1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.
  2. Boil 1 litre of freshly run water. Leave kettle to cool for 30 minutes and no longer. Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) into a sterilised bottle. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.
  3. Using the scoop provided, level off the powder with the built in leveller. Do not press/heap the powder.
  4. Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake immediately, vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds until the powder is dissolved.
  5. Cool under running tap. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately.

Storage

Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.
Best Before: See base of pack



Hazards and Cautions

Allergy Advice

Contains Milk, Eggs and Fish.



Important info

Important notice Breastfeeding is best. Infant Milk should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding, do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

IMPORTANT FEEDING ADVICE Make up each feed as required. For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

title: BARBER PRO Foot Peel
description:
The BARBER PRO Foot Peel is the perfect fix for rough, dry or callused skin. The 90 minute treatment uses 16 natural plant botanicals to remove dead or tough skin to leave your feet feeling healthier and smoother in just 7 days.
●Softening
●Revitalising
●Rehydrating
These dual layered boots slip over the feet for a relaxing treatment that softens and revitalises the skin. Within a few days, the hard skin will begin to peel away, revealing refreshed feet beneath. Salicylic Acid removes the buildup of dirt and bacteria present on the feet, cleansing the pores and dissolving dead skin cells to leave the feet feeling smooth and healthy. Paired with Glycolic Acid, this formula exfoliates and increases cell renewal to ensure that all toxins are lifted from the skin and new growth is encouraged.



Suitable for

Do not use if pregnant, Diabetic, suffer from Asthma, Eczema, Dermatitis, Psoriasis or any other skin related issues.



How to use

1. Remove booties from pouch and cut along cutting lines.

2. Wash feet thoroughly with clean water only.

3. Dry feet thoroughly and place clean, dry feet into the booties.

4. Wear for a maximum of 90 minutes. You should do this while sitting down to avoid the risk of slipping.

5. Remove booties and thoroughly wash hands and feet with water only.



Hazards and Cautions

External use only. Avoid contact with eyes and damaged skin. In case of eye contact, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.



Important info

Use water only for 7 days to clean the feet, do not use soap, body wash, detergent or similar to wash the feet so as to allow the product to fully work. Do not wash with hot water. Do not wash off while in the shower or bath. Do not apply any foot related creams or products for a minimum of 7 days. Do not swim for a minimum of 7 days. Skin will naturally shed over the next 7 days. Leave 6 weeks between use. Do not use with gel or nail polish. Do not use if pregnant, Diabetic, suffer from Asthma, Eczema, Dermatitis, Psoriasis or any other skin related issues. Do not use on wounds, broken or damaged skin. This product contains Alpha Hydroxy Acid & Salicylic Acid and should be used with care. If this product gets into the eyes, wash thoroughly with clean water. Stop using this product if there is any discomfort or irritation by immediately removing booties and rinse feet & hands with water only. Do not walk while wearing the booties as feet will be slippery. This product should not be used if you’re under the age of 16. Always consult a physician if you are unsure.



Ingredients

Aqua, Alchol Denat, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Glycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Arginine, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Salicylic Acid 0.01%, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Betaine, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Paeonia Albiflora Root Extract, Sophora Flavescens Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Disodium EDTA, Urea, Tocopheryl Acetate, Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal.



Active ingredients

  • Salicylic Acid - dissolves skin debris to unclog pores
  • Glycolic Acid - exfoliates and stimulates cellular activity to restore the area
  • Sage - increases collagen and improves elasticity
  • Anise - reduces dark marks and tightens the skin
  • Lavender - kills bacteria and reduces inflammation
  • Olive - antioxidants that protects the skin from damage caused by free radicals
  • Acerola - evens skin tone and encourages moisture retention

Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. title: Avène Hydrance Light-UV Hydrating Emulsion SPF30 Moisturiser for Dehydrated Skin 40ml
description:
A lightweight moisturiser with SPF30 protection for normal to combination sensitive skin.A hydrating moisturiser evolved from the natural moisturising properties of the eye tear film with soothing and nourishing ingredients. Hydrates your skin while protecting it against UVA-UVB rays, free radicals, and pollution.Light, non-greasy texture provides hydration, whilst  prevents water  evaporating from the skin. Soothes tightness & discomfort common with dehydrated skin. Suitable for normal to combination sensitive skin. Key IngredientsCohederm™: an innovative, patented, active ingredient that helps restore natural hydration levels in the skin, offering longer-lasting results than hyaluronic acid.
Avène Thermal Spring Water: 40%, unique; anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed; supple and soft.
Pre-Tochoperol: powerful antioxidant to protect against free radicals.                                                                          
About Avène                                                                                                                Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use

Apply in the morning to a cleansed face and neck. Routine 1. Cleanse with Mattifying Cleansing Foam 2. Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water 3. Prep with Hydrance Intense Rehydrating Serum 4. Moisturise in the morning with Hydrance Light-UV Emulsion SPF30 5. Moisturise in the evening with Hydrance Light Emulsion or Hydrance Aqua Gel



Hazards and Cautions

For external use only.



Important info

title: Babymoov Learn ISY Silicone Feeding Set Dog
description:
EAT EASY WITH THE NEW EATS' ISY MEALTIME RANGE To support fine motor skills at every stage from 6 months Accepting new foods, tastes and textures is an important phase in your child's development from the age of 6 months. As parents introducing your baby to a diversity of flavours and teaching them how to feed safely and independently is something we all want to encourage at the weaning stage. And because each stage is important, using the best mealtime accessories adapted to their age and capability makes these new discoveries that much easier and enjoyable for them.

Co-created specifically with child-care professionals As experts in weaning and feeding for baby for 25 years, Babymoov has worked with childcare professionals (occupational therapist, paediatricians and nutritionists) to develop the EAT'S ISY range: age-adapted mealtime accessories ergonomicallly designed to meet your baby's needs. 100% silicone and age specific, EAT'S ISY will help your child through all the stages of weaning and becoming independent."

The Babymoov LEARN'ISY baby mealtime set is ideal for children aged 15 to 24 months. It is designed to help your child to be more independent.  This comprehensive meal set includes all the accessories you need for baby's meals: bowl, cup, bib and a spoon.

Ideal for weaning onto solids, the bowl has different compartments to help baby learn to differentiate between different tastes and flavours. The bowl has a non-slip suction pad so it adheres to the table or the high chair tray. Your child can learn to eat by themselves without food falling on the floor.


With two handles, a removable airtight lid and a built-in straw, this training cup is especially designed to help very young children learn to be independent. It has two small feet for better stability and less risk of falling. For use with or without the lid, it is ideal for warm or cold drinks.


Really practical, the bib has a tummy pocket to catch falling food. Your baby can continue to learn whilst protecting their clothes. With an adjustable notched fastening system, this bib is also comfortable and soft. 


Ergonomic and supple, this first spoon is soft for your baby's mouth and helps them develop their fine motor skills.


Ergonomic Silicone Meal Set designed to support the development of your baby's fine motor skills

title: Babymoov Yoo Master Plus 360° Video Monitor With 5Inch Parent Screen
description:
The 360° video baby monitor with large 5" parent screen

Meet the YOO Master Plus Video baby monitor! Keep an eye on your little one at nighttime with the low emission YOO Master Plus in dark blue

NEW Beautiful modern aesthetic video monitor for the nursery 5" large parent screen (12.7 cm) Motorised technology: control the movements of the camera using the receiver


YOO Master Plus is the new video monitor from the award-winning YOO monitor range by Babymoov: Back with a new contemporary look for your nursery with a large 12.7cm high quality colour screen enabling you to safely watch over your baby while they sleep.


Operating via infrared vision, the 360-degree rotating camera with zoom function means you can keep an eye on your baby by day as well as by night. You can follow all your baby's movements from the receiver thanks to the motorised 360° technology. The parent unit covers a range of 300 metres so you will always have a good connection in your home.


'SLEEP TECHNOLOGY' MODE + ZERO EMISSION VIDEO MONITOR! **The video baby monitor features unique 'sleep' technology, which alerts you when a sound is detected. ** This technology enables you to save energy whilst extending the battery life of the parent unit. In addition, your baby will not be exposed to any waves during their sleep, giving you peace of mind.


The Yoo Master Plus includes a temperature sensor to ensure your baby has a perfect night’s sleep in the ideal room temperature. It also has 8 gentle lullabies to reassure baby and help them drift off to sleep. This video baby monitor is very user-friendly with an intuitive menu, which makes it easy to adjust the settings such as the volume and microphone sensitivity. Its Walkie-Talkie function means you can talk to your baby from your parent unit.


WANT TO WATCH OVER SEVERAL BABIES AT ONCE WITH YOUR VIDEO MONITOR?# The Yoo Master Plus has the option to add 4 further cameras. (additional cameras sold separately) You can connect as many of the cameras as you want to keep an eye on each of your babies. You can also use the VOX mode on all 4 cameras so that the screen comes on with the room where noise is detected from first. You also have the brand new split screen feature so you can view up to 4 rooms on one screen.

title: Aptamil Hungry First Baby Milk Formula Powder from Birth 800g
description:
Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science, Aptamil Hungry First Infant milk is a nutritionally complete formula* especially when it’s too early to wean*. Contains DHA** (Omega-3), Aptamil Hungry First Infant Milk is suitable from birth. Our 800g pack of Aptamil Hungry First Infant milk powder contains a scoop leveler inside the pack for more accuracy when preparing your baby’s feed. It also comes complete with a secure scoop store to keep your hands and scoop out of the powder. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil Follow on milk 2 is tailored for babies from 6 to 12 months as part of a varied and balanced diet. With vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system.. * As required by the legislation for all infant milk, it is nutritionally complete and suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth when it’s too early to introduce solid foods, or as part of a weaning diet from 6 to 12 months. Before introducing solid foods, speak to your healthcare professional **As required by the legislation for all infant formula. Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our passionate team of more than 500 scientists and experts have developed our Aptamil® Hungry First Infant Milk. Our formulation is nutritionally complete* and suitable from birth as a breastmilk substitute. Our experts are here for you.

Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen, and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



Suitable for

Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months or as part of a weaning diet up to 12 months.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

Preparing Your Baby's Feed Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.5 kg, 7 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 3; Quantity of water per feed: 90 ml, 3 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.9 kg, 8 1/2 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 4; Quantity of water per feed: 120 ml, 4 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.7 kg, 10 1/2 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 5; Quantity of water per feed: 150 ml, 5 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx. weight: 5.4 kg, 12 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180 ml, 6 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx. weight: 6.2 kg, 13 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180 ml, 6 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx. weight: 6.9 kg, 15 1/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx. weight: 7.6 kg, 16 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx. weight: - kg, - lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice. Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.

This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.

Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils. Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised bottle as per the feeding guide.
Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly bolled water.
Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, use the leveller on the inside of the box to level off the scoops. Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill.
Shake: Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
Cool the bottle by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.

Important feeding and storage advice Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.



Hazards and Cautions

Contains Fish, Milk and Soya

Storage

Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.



Important info

Important notice Breastfeeding is best. Infant Milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

Made with our unique blend of GOS/FOS*** Omega-3, calcium and vitamins A and C, Aptamil Toddler Milk also contains iron to support normal cognitive development. Our 800g pack of Aptamil Growing Up Milk powder contains a scoop leveler inside the pack for more accuracy when preparing your toddler’s beaker. It also comes complete with a secure scoop storer to keep your hands and scoop out of the powder. *As required by the legislation **As recommended for toddlers by the Department of Health (UK)/Food Safety Authority of Ireland ***A blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process to support your baby on their feeding journey. Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood.

Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.



Suitable for

Suitable for toddlers aged 1+ Years. For 2-3 years, use Aptamil 3 Toddler Milk Powder 2-3 Years 800g.



How to use

Preparation and Usage

A Pack Designed for You Double safety strip To be sure your formula has not been opened and retains its freshness Scoop leveller To get the dose just right Scoop storer
To keep your scoop and hands out of the powder

Preparing Your Toddler's Drink We recommend giving your toddler about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil® Toddler Milk a day, as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil Toddler Milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 1 year onwards.
1 Beaker: No. of level scoops per drink (1 scoop = 5.0g): 5, Quantity of water per drink: 150 ml / 5 fl oz

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time. 1 Water: Measure 150ml or 5fl.oz of boiled, cooled water into a clean beaker.
2 Powder: Using the scoop provided, add 5 levelled scoops of powder into the beaker. Do not press/heap the powder.
3 Shake: Place the clean lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
4 Check temperature and drink immediately.

Important feeding and storage advice Make up each drink as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up drinks, discard unfinished drinks as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your toddler's drink.
Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding.



Hazards and Cautions

Contains Fish, Milk and Soya

Storage

Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.



Important info

Dental advice Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice.

title: Avène Gentle Exfoliating Gel for Sensitive Skin 75ml
description:
A gentle gel texture scrub to smoothe and deeply cleanse sensitive skin. Gentle, gel textured scrub to deeply cleanse sensitive skin. Effectively eliminates dead cells and impurities without aggravating or drying. Use before a mask or moisturiser to improve the efficacy of the ingredients and refine the skin texture, leaving it radiant and healthy‐looking. Suitable for all skin types.Key Ingredients

About AveneAvène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.



How to use

Apply to either wet or dry skin, avoiding the eye contour area. Gently massage with fingertips using circular movements, then rinse off with lukewarm water. Oily/Combination skin usetwice a week, normal skin once a week and dry to very dry skin once every ten days.Routine1. Exfoliate skin once or twice a week with Gentle Exfoliating Gel2. Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water
3. Moisturise using any Avène Les Essentiels or Hydrance Moisturiser of your choice
